brtson 'grus rtsom pa'o/ /tshangs pa/ gang la lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi rtsom pa med pa 'di ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu phyir mi ldog pa
la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ tshangs pa khyad par sems la bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa/ lha'i bu 'di ji skad ston pa de bzhin no/ /'di ni de'i brtson 'grus
rtsom pa'i mchog ste/ gang lus kyi rtsom pa'ang med/ ngag gi rtsom pa med/ yid kyi rtsom pa'ang med pa 'di ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i mchog go /tshangs pa/ ngas mngon par shes
pa 'das pa'i dus na sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad bsnyungs pa thams cad yang dag par blang pa'i brtson 'grus brtsams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to/ /de bzhin du bla ma rnams la ldang ba dang / rim gro bya ba dang / dgon par gnas pa dang / mang du thos pa dang / sems can
rnams kyi bya ba la kun tu 'gro ba'i brtson 'grus brtsams kyang nga lung ma bstan to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi rtsom pa la rab tu gnas pa'i
phyir ro/ /tshangs pa/ nam nga lha'i bu 'dis ji skad du bstan pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa de lta bu dang / ldan par gyur pa de'i 'og tu nga de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis bram
ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ /tshangs pa/
de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa'i sa myur du thob par 'dod pas brtson 'grus rtsom pa 'di lta bu/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad la rtsom pa med pa'i brtson 'grus
'di la brtsom par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rtsom pa ma mchis pa'i brtson 'grus de gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa/ gang dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang
ldan pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'di lta ste/
'das pa'i sems ni zad/ ma 'ongs pa ni ma phyin/ da ltar byung ba la ni gnas pa med cing mi dmigs te/ gang zad pa de ni dmigs su med do/ /gang ma phyin pa de ni mi skye ba'i
mtshan nyid do/ /de bzhin du gang da ltar byung ba de'ang chos nyid kyis mi gnas so/ /chos nyid gang yin pa de'ang ma skyes pa'o/ /gang ma skyes pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma
'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin no/ /gang 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin pa de ni rang bzhin no/ /rang bzhin
gang yin pa de ni ma skyes pa ste/ tshangs pa/ dus gsum mnyam nyid dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa de lta bu 'di ni lung bstan pa myur du thob par byed do/ /tshangs pa/
byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pa ni chos thams cad gtong ba med pa'i sbyin pa la mos so/ /chos thams cad bsrung ba
med pa'i tshul khrims la mos so/ /chos thams cad rlom sems med pa'i bzod pa la mos so/ /chos thams cad rtsom pa med pa'i brtson 'grus la mos so/ /chos
thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la mos so/ /chos thams cad rnam par mi rtog pa'o zhes shes rab la mos so/ /de de ltar mos pas lhag par mi
byed| bri bar mi byed/ byed pa ma yin/ rnam par byed pa ma yin no/ /sbyin pa'ang sbyin par byed la de'ang rnam par smin pa la mi re bas so/ /tshul khrims kyang
srung la de'ang sgro btags pa med pas so/ /bzod pa'ang sgom la de'ang phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis so/ /brtson 'grus kyang rtsom la de'ang yongs su grub pa med pas so/ /
bsam gtan la'ang mnyam par 'jog la de'ang gnas pa med pas so/ /shes rab kyang sgom la de'ang mtshan ma med pas so/ /tshangs pa/ byang chub sems
dpa' bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pa ni bya ba thams cad kyang ston pa bya bas kyang mi gos so/ /de mi gos pas chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid thob cing
rnyed pas kyang mi 'phrogs/ rnyed pa med pas kyang ma yin/ snyan pas kyang ma yin/ mi snyam pas kyang ma yin/ smad pas kyang ma yin/ bstod pas kyang ma yin/ sdug
bsngal gyis kyang ma yin/ bde bas kyang mi 'phrogs so/ /de 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad las rnam par 'das te/ gnyis su dmigs pa'i sems dang bral
zhing gnyis su med pa'i chos rtogs pa'i phyir khengs par yang mi byed/ 'dud par yang mi byed/ sdud par yang mi byed/ khong khro ba'ang mi byed/ gnod par yang
mi byed/ kun nas gnod par yang mi byed/ rlom sems su'ang mi byed/ bag med par yang mi byed/ kun nas bag med par yang mi byed do/ /sems can thams
cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir lta ba gnyis su ltung ba'i sems can rnams kyi don du snying rje chen po bskyed nas ched du bsam nas srid pa nye bar len te/ tshangs pa/
gang 'di bdag med pa'i bzod pa rab tu thob pas sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed de/ skye bo yongs su 'dzin pa 'di ni brtson 'grub rtsom pa'i mchog yin
no| |brtson 'grus brtsam pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag brgyad mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes par gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyang
bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad ming gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus brtan pa zhes bya bar sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad par byang chub
mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ /de nas 'khor der tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po 'dug par gyur pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gang klu chen po de dag ni char 'bebs na rgya mtsho chen por 'bebs te/ sa phyogs gzhan du ma lags so/ /
bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa klu chen po dang mtshungs pa 'di dag kyang chos kyi char 'di 'dra ba 'di skyes bu dam pa mtsho chen po rgya mtsho lta bu 'di dag gi sems
kyi rgyud la 'bebs te/ sems can gzhan dag la ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung / ji skad zer ba de bzhin yin mod kyi klu'i
rgyal po chen po de dag la ni gang gi phyir dzam+bu'i gling 'dir char pa mi 'bebs par 'gyur ba'i ser sna med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dzam+bu gling gi sa phyogs kyis char
pa'i rgyun shing rta'i srog shing tsam de dag mi bzod do/ /'od srung / gal te klu chen po de dag gis dzam+bu gling 'dir char phab par gyur na de sa dzam+bu gling 'di grong
dang / grong khyer dang bcas/ ri dang / brag dang / ri bor bcas/ khor yug dang 'obs su bcas pa/ 'di lta ste/ rdza ma'i chus rgya shug gi lo ma bteg pa bzhin du
bteg nas khyer bar 'gyur te/ de bas na klu chen po de dag dzam+bu gling 'dir char pa mi 'bebs so/ |'od srung / de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa 'di dag la ni gang gi phyir sems
can de dag gzhan la chos kyi char pa chen po mi 'bebs par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi ser sna med mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'di dag chos 'di lta bu dag gi snod du ma gyur te/ de lta
bas na skyes bu dam pa de dag rgya mtsho lta bu'i blo mchog dang ldan pa de dag la chos kyi char pa chen po 'bebs so/ /'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ char pa'i rgyun shing
rta'i srog shing tsam bab pa de dag gis kyang rgya mtsho chen po bri ba'ang med/ gang ba'ang med do/ /'od srung / de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa de dag bskal pa brgyar chos nyan
tam| 'chad kyang chos gang yang bri ba'am/ gang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po der gling chen po bzhi'i klung sna tshogs nas gang chu 'bab pa de dag thams cad/
'di lta ste/ lan tshwa'i ror ro gcig par 'gyur ro/ /'od srung / de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa de dag rnam grangs sna tshogs su chos bstan pa bshad pa dag thos ma thag tu
'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi ror ro gcig tu mos par 'gyur ro/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni dag pa/ gtsang ba/ dri ma med pa/ gsal ba/
rnyog pa med pa yin te/ chu rnyog pa can mi 'dzin to/ /'od srung / de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa de dag kyang dag pa/ gtsang ba/ dri ma med pa/ gsal ba ste/ gnod sems dang / zhe
sdang dang / khro ba dang / 'khon du 'dzin pa'i tha ba thams cad mi 'dzin to/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni zab cing gting dpag dka' ba'o/ /de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa
de dag kyang chos kyi tshul zab mo la rab tu zhugs shing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gting dpag dka'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni chu tshad med cing
rin po che'i tshogs dpag tu med pa'o/ /'od srung / de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa de dag kyang shes rab tshad med cing chos rin po che'i tshogs dpag tu med do/ /'od srung / 'di
lta ste| dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po rin po che sna tshogs kyi dbyings so/ /'od srung / de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa de dag kyang mngon par bsgrub pa sna tshogs kyis chos rin po che chad
med pa'i dbyings so/ /'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas rin po che kha cig rin thang yod pa dang / kha cig rin thang med pa dang / kha cig mching bu lta bu
dang rnam pa gsum 'byung ste/ 'od srung / de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa de dag sems can gyi dbang po ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston pa na'ang nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
dang / gang 'og ma theg pa chen po la sems kyi rgyud rnam par 'grol lo/ /'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni sems can gcig gi ched du mi gnas so/ /'od srung / de
bzhin du skyes bu dam pa de dag kyang sems can gcig gi don du byang chub tu sems mi skyed do/ /'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni mthar gyis gzhol/ mthar gyis
'bab| mthar gyis bab pa'o/ /'od srung / de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa de dag kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gzhol/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'bab/ thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid du bab pa'o/ /'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni shi ba'i ro dang lhan cig mi gnas so/ /'od srung / de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa de dag kyang nyan thos dang rang
sangs rgyas kyi sems dang lhan cig mi gnas so/ /ser sna dang / ngang tshul ngan pa'i sems dang / gnod sems dang / le lo'i sems dang / brjed ngas pa dang / 'chal ba'i shes rab kyi
sems dang lhan cig mi gnas so/ /bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gang zag dang / skyes bur lta ba dang lhan cig mi gnas so/ /'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper
na| bskal pas sreg par gyur pa'i tshe/ klung dang / chu bran dang / chu mig dang / mtshe'u dang / rdzing bu dang / mtsho thams cad sngar skam par 'gyur te/
phyis rgya mtsho chen po zad cing skam par 'gyur ro/ /'od srung / de bzhin du dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i tshe nyi tshe bar spyod pa la zhugs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi
dam pa'i chos sngar nub par 'gyur te/ phyis skyes bu dam pa blo gros rgya mtsho lta bu sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang dag par 'dzin pa de dag gi lag nas dam pa'i chos nub par
'gyur te/ yang / 'od srung / skyes bu dam pa de dag ni srog kyang yongs su gtong par byed kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su gtong bar mi byed na/ 'od srung / skyes bu dam pa de lta bu dag gi
lag nas dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba yod dam/ de dag gi dam pa'i chos nub par khyod kyis mi blta'o/ /'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po nor bu rin po che
rin po che thams cad 'dus pa zhes bya ba rdo rje tshogs kyi nor bu rin po che zhig yod do/ /de nyi ma bdun shar nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du 'od zer byung yang rin po che de
tshig par mi 'gyur te/ gang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag na rgya mtsho chen po yod pa der nor bu chen po che de der 'pho bar 'gyur te/ 'od
srung / gang nor bu rin po che de rgya mtsho chen po las gzhan du ma 'phos pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir tshig par mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/ de ni gnas
med do| |'od srung / de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa de lta bu de dag kyang dam pa'i chos yongs su zad par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gnas par dam pa ma yin pa'i chos bdun byung ba'i
tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du 'pho bar 'gyur ro/ /bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mu stegs can gyi gnas dang / sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa dang / log pa'i sbyor ba dang /
gcig la gcig 'tshe ba'i sbyor ba dang / lta bar gyur pa'i thib po dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba 'joms par byed pa dang / mthob cing mngon par ma rtogs pa ste/ dam pa ma yin pa'i chos
bdun po de dag 'jig rten gnas par byung ba de na sems can rnams snod ma yin par shes nas skyes bu dam pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du 'pho bar 'gyur te/ sangs
rgyas mthong ba dang / dam pa'i chos mnyan pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'bar ba dang yang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /'od srung /
'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po la brten cing sems can tshad med pa dag gnas so/ /'od srung / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la brten cing sems can tshad
med pa dag phun sum tshogs pa gsum la gnas so/ /gsum gang zhe na/ lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang / mi'i phun sum tshogs pa dang / mya ngan las
'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni sems can gzhan dag gis btung bar mi nus so/ /'od srung / de bzhin du
skyes bu dam pa de dag gis gang chos bstan pa de dag kyang pha rol gyi rgol ba rnams kyis btung bar mi nus so/ /'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na
sems can gnas pa de dag ni chu gzhan mi 'tshol gyi de nyid la 'thung ngo / /'od srung / de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa de dag kyang gzhan gyi ngor lta bas chos kyi ro mi 'thung gi /
rang byung gi ye shes kyi chos kyi ro 'thung ngo / /de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ stong gsum gyi stong
chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho chen po'i gting ngam/ tshad bzung ba ni nus kyi/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis skyes bu dam pa
de dag gi gting ngam tshad bzung ba ni mi nus te/ de bas na skyes bu dam pa de dag sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs zhes bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od
srung / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi rgya mtsho chen po rnams kyi gting ngam/ tshad ni bzung bar nus kyi/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
dang / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis skyes bu dam pa blo gros mchog rgya mtsho lta bu dang ldan pa de dag gi gting ngam/ tshad bzung ba ni mi nus so/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs
su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /ji ltar chog mi shes par chu chen gter/ /'bab chu thams cad kun gyi chu 'tshol ba/ /de bzhin de rnams 'di la chos 'tshol kyang / /rtag par chos kyis
chog par 'gyur pa med/ /ji ltar ji snyed chu mang rab bsdus kyang / /'di la rgya mtsho 'gribs shing gang 'gyur med/ /dam pa'i chos thos nas kyang chos kyi dbyings/ /shin tu 'phel
zhing 'grib par mthong ba med/ /ji ltar dri med rgya mtsho chu sdud kyang / /rnyog pa can gyi 'bab chu der mi 'bab/ /de bzhin thub mkhas spyad pa spyod pa yang / /de dag rnam dag nyon mongs
mi sdud do/ /ji ltar rgya mtsho chen po lus 'chang bas/ /zab cing gting yangs pas na mi dpogs pa/ /de bzhin yon tan rgya mtsho ye shes kyang / /pha rol rgol pa rnams kyis dpag mi
nus| |ji ltar rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i 'bab chu rnams/ /rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang ro gcig 'gyur/ /de bzhin rnam pa sna tshogs chos thos nas/ /de dag rnam par grol bar ro gcig
'gyur| |ji ltar chu 'dzin rgya mtsho chen po ni/ /skye bo gcig gi don phyir mi gnas te/ /de bzhin byang chub tu yang zhugs pa dag /de dag 'gro ba kun la phan
phyir zhugs/ /ji ltar rgya mtsho rin chen dbyings yin zhing / /de la gnas nas nor bu rin chen 'byung / /de bzhin rin chen 'byung gnas sems can mchog /de dag las ni rin chen
gsum 'dir 'byung / /ji ltar rnam par mi rtog rgya mtsho na/ /rtag par rin chen rnam pa gsum 'byung ste/ /de bzhin de dag chos rnams ston pa yang / /theg pa gsum gyis sems
can dag par 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'bab pa dang ni 'gram nyid nas/ /rgya mtsho chen po mthar gyis gzhol ba ltar/ /de bzhin sems can mchog rnams kun mkhyen gzhol/ /
sems can rab tu dgrol phyir rtag tu brtson/ /ji ltar rgya mtsho ro dang mi gnas te/ /de dag gi ni ma 'dres chos 'di yin/ /de bzhin byang chub mchog la zhugs pa yang / /dman
pa'i theg pa dang ni gnas mi byed/ /ji ltar rgya mtsho las byung rin chen ni/ /rin chen sdud ces bya ba sra bsngags pa/ /sreg pa'i bskal pa byung yang mi tshig ste/ /de yang 'jig
rten 'jig tshe gzhan du 'gro /de bzhin dri ma med pa'i chos 'dzin tshe/ /brtson 'grus mchog ldan de dag 'bad cing 'dzin/ /snod min 'jig rten chos min 'dod rig nas/ /
mkhas pa rgyal ba gzhan gyi drung du 'gro/ /nam zhig sreg pa'i bskal pa byung gyur te/ /chu mig mtsho dang lteng ka skam par 'gyur/ /rgya mtsho 'dir ni phyi nas skam par 'gyur/ /stong gsum
chen po 'di yang rab tu 'jig /nyi tshe'i spyod la nye bar gnas pa yi/ /'di la mchog tu bya ba'i chos nus pa/ /de tshe 'dir ni sems can mchog chos 'di/ /lus dang srog kyang bor
nas srung bar byed/ /bde gshegs 'das na'ang rtag par bag med pas/ /de dag rnams la chos 'di mi 'jig go /de ltar de rnams bsam pa'ang rnam par dag /chos la gnas
shing spyod pa rtag par spyod/ /ji ltar rgya mtsho sems can tshad med gnas/ /sems can gcig gi don du mi 'jug pa/ /de bzhin 'jig rten thams cad rnam grol phyir/ /grags pa
chen po 'di dag rab tu 'jug /'jig rten khams 'di rgya mtsho ji snyed pa/ /ma lus par ni tshad rnams shes rung yang / /rgyal ba de dag kun gyi spyod pa ni/ /dgra bcom rang rgyal dag
gis shes mi nus/ /ma lus phyogs kyi nam mkha'i dbyings rnams kyang / /mchog rnams kyi ni tshad bzung nus srid kyi/ /nam mkha' bas kyang lhag pa de dag gi /ye shes tshad ni nam
yang gzung mi nus/ /byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtul brtan zhing / /gang dag 'jig rten ma lus dgrol ba'i phyir/ /rgya che yangs pa'i sems rab gzhol byas pa/ /'od
srung de dag mtshungs med ga la lhag /de dag rin chen 'byung gnas rgya mtsho 'dra/ /de dag bsod nams yin la bsod nams zhing / /de dag dpyad pa'i
rgyal po sman pa'i mchog /sems can yun ring na ba thar bar byed/ /de dag gnas yin skyabs dang dpung gnyen te/ /skyob pa sgron ma de bzhin 'od byed pa/ /skye bo ldongs pa rnams
kyi mig skyed pa/ /de thob pas na de dag bdud rtsi thob/ /de dang de dag chos kyi rgyal mchog 'bar/ /de rnams brgya byin don mang sems pa ste/ /tshangs pa bsam gtan bzhi la gnas
pa yin| |de dag tshangs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /de dag ded dpon mkhas pa 'dren pa ste/ /log pa'i lam du gnas la lam ston pa/ /de dang de dag bdud 'jom dpa' bo
ste| |sems can dam pa byang chub snying por gnas/ /de dag chos dkar tshad med zla ba bzhin/ /de dag 'od zer mngon 'phags nyi ma 'dra/ /sprin lta bur yang tshad med blo sgrogs
shing / /'jig rten gsum na bdud rtsi'i char pa 'bebs/ /de dag seng ge lta bur 'jigs skyon med/ /glang po che ltar shin tu dul ba'i sems/ /de dag ri rab ri bo 'dra mtshungs
te| |de dag pha rol rgol bas mi thub bo/ /de dag rnam par dang ba chu bzhin te/ /rtag tu bsnyen par dka' ba me dang 'dra/ /de dag rlung ltar rtag tu chags med cing / /sa dang 'dra
par tha ba rab tu spangs/ /gnod sems nga rgyal tha ba phrag dog bral/ /de dag rtsi yi shing ltar rtog pa med/ /'jig rten chos rnams brgyad pos ma gos shing / /de dag tshul khrims rnam dag
pad+ma bzhin/ /de dag u du ma wA ra'i me tog ltar/ /dge zhing bskal pa phye bar sgra thos dka'/ /de dag rkang gnyis gtso la byas pa gzo/ /de dag sangs rgyas rigs la gnas par brtson/ /
de dag snying rje che zhing brtul shugs brtan/ /byams la gnas dang dga' la mngon par 'phags/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la btang snyoms zhing / /rtag tu rgyal pa dag gi nor rnams 'tshol//
de dang de dag sbyin pas khyad par song / /ye shes tshul khrims la yang rab tu gnas/ /de dag bzod pa'i stobs kyis gcig tu dpa'/ /brtson 'grus 'phags shing rtag tu mthu dang
ldan|| |de dag bsam gtan mngon par shes la mkhas/ /de dag tshad med zhing du 'phrul gyis 'gro /thub pa dam mchog la yang chos nyan cing / /ji ltar thos pa dag kyang ston par byed/ /
ji ltar 'di mos rnam par 'grol ba yang / /skye bo dag gi spyod pa de dag shes/ /ji ltar mos pa mkhas shing rtogs pa ste/ /nan tan snying por byed cing mu stegs thob/ /'di rnams tshogs
pa las ni 'di skye zhes/ /de dang de dag chos kun rab tu shes/ /de dag rkyen la mkhas shing rtog pa ste/ /mtha' gnyis lta ba spangs shing mnyam la dga'/ /chos 'di gang nas 'ong
shing gar 'gro zhing / /de dag chos la tshul bzhin rnam par lta/ /chos kun 'ong ba ma yin 'byung ba yin/ /gnas pa chos nyid mtshungs par rab tu
shes| |ji lta ji ltar 'dus byas rdzun du mthong / /de lta de ltar snying rje can du 'gyur/ /mi bden nyon mongs skye bo sdug bsngal te/ /de dag thar bar bya phyir spyad pa spyod/ /nga dang
nga yi zhes ni rnam brtags nas/ /byis pa mi mnyam pa la brtson pas spyod/ /chos de yang dag ma yin shes nas ni/ /lta ba spang pa'i phyir ni chos la spyod/ /bdag med bdag tu mi
sdug sdug par te/ /sdug bsngal bde bar mi rtag rtag par yang / /sems log so so'i skye bo rnams la ni/ /'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' yang yod ma yin/ /de dag log pa'i
sbyor ba de shes nas/ /'di la sems can med dang gang zag med/ /gang la bdag sdug rtag bde med pa yin/ /yang dag sbyor ba la yang rnam par sgom/ /'od srung de yi yon
tan 'di brjod pa/ /sa yi rdul phran ji bzhin phyogs tsam ste/ /byang chub sems dpa' de yi spyod yul gang / /de dag ye shes bsngags pa mtha' yas so/ /stong gsum
'jig rten mchod pa ci yod pa/ /kun gyis byang chub sems dpa' de la mchod/ /de las lhag par yang ni mchod 'os te/ /rgyal ba'i thugs sras dag ni phyir mi ldog /gang
rnams sangs rgyas 'gyur bar brtson ldan pa/ /de dag gis ni nga dang ma byon dang / /gang yang mya ngan 'das pa'i rgyal ba dang / /ma lus phyogs bzhugs rim gror byas par 'gyur/ /de
nas tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ ci nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyin gyi
rlabs kyis phyi ma'i 'dus phyi ma'i tshe lnga brgya tha ma la rab tu spyod pa dang / rgyas par 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gsol
ba thob cig /de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshangs pa khyad par sems la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshangs pa/ de ji snyam du sems/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
la chos gang de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i chos gang yang de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su bstan tam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ de ni ma yin no/ /'jam
dpal gyis smras pa/ tshangs pa/ de lta bas na 'di la brjod pa med pas na chos thams cad byin gyis ma brlabs pa ste/ de ni nub par mi 'gyur zhing bsrung bar bya ba ma yin no/ /tshangs
pa| gang chos gang la'ang byin gyis brlab par 'dod pa de ni nam mkha' byin gyis brlab par 'dod do/ /tshangs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gang yang khas len na de ni
chos smra ba de ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' smra ba thams cad las phyir ldog pa ni rtsod pa med pa lhur byed pa ma yin no/ /tshangs pa/
byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'di snyam du 'khor 'dir chos bstan to snyam du sems na de dag la chos pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thos pa med pa ni chos thos pa'o/ /smras
pa| 'jam dpal/ thos pa med pa ni chos thos pa'o zhes bya ba ci las bsam te de skad zer/ smras pa/ tshangs pa/ mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyis
thos pa med pa ni chos thos pa ste/ gang skye mched de dag ni gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos la mi 'dzin pa de dag ni chos thos pa'o/ /de nas 'khor
de nas lha'i bu stong phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dge slong stong phrag lnga dang / dge slong ma sum brgya dang / dge bsnyen brgyad brgyad dang / dge bsnyen ma brgyad brgya de dag thams
cad kyis 'jam dpal gyis bstan pa 'di thos nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob ste/ tshig kyang 'di skad du/ 'jam dpal/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin
te| thos pa med pa ni chos thos pa'o zhes 'dzer to/ /de nas tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis bzod pa rab tu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
khyed kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos sam/ smras pa/ tshangs pa/ thos pa med pa'i tshul gyis thos so/ /smras pa/ khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ji ltar shes/ smras pa/ ji ltar shes pa med
pa dang / rnam par shes pa med pa de ltar ro/ /smras pa/ khyed kyis chos gang rab tu thob pas bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur/ smras pa/ chos thams cad rab tu thob pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /
smras pa/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ji ltar rtogs par bya/ smras pa/ rtogs par bya ba med pa'i tshul gyis so/ /smras pa/ chos bstan pa 'di khyed kyi mngon sum yin nam/ smras pa/ tshangs pa/
chos thams cad bdag dang / gzhan med pa'i phyir mngon sum yin no/ /de nas 'khor de nyid du lha'i bu dri ma med tog ces bya ba 'dus par gyur pa des changs pa khyad par sems la 'di
skad ces smras so/ /tshangs pa/ gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las chung du na nyan par 'gyur ba de dag gal te de bzhin gshegs pas lung ma bstan kyang kho bos de dag bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshangs pa/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'bras bu dang sa bon chud mi gzon pa'o/ /'phags pa yang dag par
zhugs pa thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bskyed pa'o/ /bdud dang phyir rgol ba tshar gcod pa'o/ /bar du gcod pa thams cad dang
bral ba'o/ /dang ba skye bar byed pa'o/ /dad pa dang ldan pa rnams dga' zhing mgu bar byed pa'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shin tu yongs su gzung ba'o//
chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis legs par bsrungs pa'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni gcig tu nges pa ste phyir mi ldog pa'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs
'di ni byang chub kyi snying po la mi slu ba'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rnams kyi bden pa'i 'byung gnas so/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
ba'o| |chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'gyod pa rnams sel bar byed pa'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam rnam par spyong ba'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni thar
bar 'dod pa rnams kyis legs par thos pa'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni gzungs 'dod pa rnams kyis legs par gzung ba'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bsod nams
'dod pa rnams kyis legs par rab tu bstan pa'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni chos 'dod pa rnams kyis legs par bsrung ba'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni mya ngan las 'das
par 'gro ba'i phyir grangs med pa'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni pha rol gyi rgol ba dmigs pa can gyis mi 'phrogs pa'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sbyin par 'os pa
rnams dang mthun pa'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni mkhas pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni lta ba ngan pa dang bral bas shes rab bskyed pa'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs
'di ni gti mug 'joms par byed pas ye shes bskyed pa'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni yi ge'i tshig nges pas shin tu nges pa'i tshig go /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'bru 'brel
pas legs par bstan pa'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni don dam pa yang dag par ston pas don yang dag par bskyed pa'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni chos brjod pa rnams kyis
yongs su ma btang ba'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni shes pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis ma bor ba'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni nor 'dod pa rnams kyi gter ro/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
ni kun tu gdungs pa rnams yongs su gdung ba med par byed pa'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni byams pa la gnas pa rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid bskyed pa'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni
le lo can rnams kyis brtson 'grus bskyed pa'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni brjed ngas pa rnams kyi bsam gtan bskyed pa'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni shes rab 'chal pa rnams
la snang bar byed pa'o/ /tshangs pa/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad shin tu legs par gnas so/ /de nas lha'i bu des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i bsngags
ba bstan pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang lha'i bud la legs so zhes
bya ba byin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lha'i bu 'dis sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
dag las sngon chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa/ lha'i bu 'dis sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi las chos kyi rnam
grangs 'di thos te/ tshangs pa/ lha'i bu dri ma med pa'i tog 'di bskal pa brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis na 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen ldan du de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen
bkod pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gang yang de'i bar du sangs rgyas 'byung ba de dag thams cad la'ang mnyes par byed par 'gyur/ bkur stir byed par 'gyur
te| sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang thos par 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang /
lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za gang dag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bzod pa rab tu thob pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa'i sangs
rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen ldan du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu dri ma med pa'i tog gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang bdag ni
byang chub mi 'tshal/ /mi smon/ mngon par mi dga'/ mngon par ma chags/ mi dmigs/ mi sems/ mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog na/ ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la lung
bstan| bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu/ 'di ltar skyes bu la la zhig gis rtswa dang / shing dang / yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma dag mer bcug nas 'di skad du rtswa
dang / shing dang / yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma dag ma tshig ces smras na/ de de'i dbang gis mi 'tshig pa yin no/ /lha'i bu/ de bzhin du 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub la
mngon par mi dga'/ mngon par ma chags/ mi dmigs/ mi 'dod/ mi smon/ mi sems/ rnam par mi rtog kyang sangs rgyas thams cad lung ston te/ lha'i bu/ 'on kyang byang chub
sems dpa' gang byang chub la mngon par mi dga'/ mngon par ma chags/ mi dmigs/ mi 'dod/ mi smon/ mi sems/ rnam par mi rtog pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
lung ston to/ /de nas 'khor der lha'i bu lnga brgya tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang byang chub la mngon par mi dga'/ mngon
par mi chags/ mi dmigs/ mi 'tshal/ mi smon/ mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog na/ ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung mi bstan/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus steng gi phyogs na steng gi bar snang la sangs rgyas stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs
pa de dag gis de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
'das| de bzhin gshegs pas 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub la mngon par mi dga'/ mngon par mi chags/ mi dmigs/ mi 'dod/ mi smon/ mi
sems| mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog pa de byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro zhes legs par gsungs pa 'di ni ngo mtshar te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis steng gi
phyogs na sangs rgyas stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad bdag cag la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston
to| |de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang slad ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dzam+bu gling 'dir chos
kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod pa dang / yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang dag go cha chen po bgos pa dag gi rna lam du gda' bar 'gyur ba dang /
rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag bdud kyi las skyes shing byung ba rnams kyi dbang du mi mchi ba dang / de dag bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha dag gis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba
dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis yongs su bzung zhing go cha chen po bgos te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su mi nyams par byin gyis brlab par gsol/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ de bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab pa dang /yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod
sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grul bum 'bebs pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa dang / sngags kyi tshig 'di bshad kyis
nyon cig/ rig pa dang / sngags kyi tshig de bcangs pas rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo chos smra ba de lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grul bum rnams kyis yongs su srung ba rab tu thob ste/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag lam mam/ lam log par song
ngam| gtsug lag khang du song ngam/ gnas khang du song ngam/ 'chag pa la zhugs sam/ 'khor gyi nang du song yang rung ste srung bar byed do/ /spobs
pa skyed par byed/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtog pa'i stobs bskyed pa nye bar sbyor te/ de la pha rol gyi rgol ba 'am/ phas kyi dgra glags tshol ba dag gis glags kyang
rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de dran zhing shes bzhin du ldang bar 'gyur/ 'chag par 'gyur/ 'dug par 'gyur/ nyal bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ de la rig pa dang / sngags kyi
tshig de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ud d+hu re/ d+hu d+hu re/ man te/ tsa ti ma/ go tsa ri/ shI la li/ hi li mi li/ thi li/ thi mi li/ hu lu hu lu hu lu/ e bad te/ be ta Te/ kha kha re/ kha re/

kha ra ke /A san ne/ dza ga ti/ ma hi le/ ma nu Sha/ ta ne ma na se ba ra gan d+he/ sarba ru tri/ ra bA ba ga ti/ si na d+hu le/ na mo b+hud d+he b+h+yaH/ tsa di ra te/ na mo d+harmA ya nirga ta ni/ na maH

saM g+hA ya/ b+ha hi ta pA be/ byu pa shAn+tA nai/ sarba pA pA ni mai tre me/ sarba b+hu d+he b+h+yaHsa t+ya ni ra de sha bra h+ma pa tho/ mahA r-i Shi b+hiH/ pra shAsta ta tra triSh+Than ti/ sarba b+hu ta grA hA/ na maHsarba
b+hud+d+he b+h+yaHsid+h+yan+tu me man+t+ra me man+t+ra pa dA swAhA/ 'jam dpal/ rig pa dang sngags kyi tshig 'di byang chub sems dpa' gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brtson pa/ rtag tu shes bzhin
dang ldan pa/ mi rgod pa/ khengs pa med pa/ sems ma g.yengs pa/ kun tu spyod pa gtsang ba/ stsogs pa dang bral ba/ cho ga shes pa/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la mngon par dga' ba/
'du 'dzi nyung ba/ lus dang / sems dben pa/ byams pa dang / snying rje la mngon par dga' ba/ chos la dga' zhing mos pa/ bden pa'i tshig la rab tu gnas pa/ mi slu ba/ nang du
yang dag 'jog la mngon par dga' ba/ tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la brtson pa/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang bral ba/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa
la mngon par dga' ba/ rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa la sems mnyam pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon du phyogs pa/ 'khor bas 'jigs shing skrag pa/ sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa la sems
mnyam pa/ 'du shes sna tshogs dang bral ba/ lus dang / srog 'dor ba dang / dngos po thams cad la mi lta ba/ spyod pa dang / cho ga phun sum tshogs pa/ tshul khrims dang / sdom pa la mngon
par dga' ba/ bzod pa dang / des pa mang ba/ ngan du zer ba bzod pa'i rang bzhin can/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bya ba ci yod ces bya ba la brtson pa/ bzhin
'dzum pa/ khro gnyer dang bral ba/ gsong por smra ba/ nga rgyal bcom pa/ des pa/ 'grogs na bde ba/ de lta bu'i spyod pa la rab tu gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos/
'jam dpal/ sngags kyi tshig 'di rab tu gdon par bya'o/ /'jam dpal/ de ltar na chos smra ba de tshe 'di nyid la stobs bskyed pa bcu rab tu 'thob bo/ /
bcu gang zhe na/ mi brjed pa'i chos nyid pas dran pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang / chos rab tu 'byed pa la mkhas pas blo gros kyi stobs bskyed pa dang / mdo sde'i chul khong du chud
pas rtogs pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang / sdom pa dang / spyod pa mi gtong bas dad pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang / bdag dang / gzhan srung bas ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa'i stobs
bskyed pa dang / shes rab yongs su rdzogs pas thos pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang / thos pa thams cad yongs su 'dzin pas gzungs kyi stobs bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
byin gyis yongs su bzung bas spobs pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga rab tu thob pas zab mo'i stobs bskyed pa dang / myur du thams cad mkhyen pa'i
ye shes yongs su rdzogs pas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'i stobs bskyed pa ste/ 'jam dpal/ spyod pa la zhugs pa'i chos smra ba gang rig pa dang / sngags kyi tshig 'di rab tu
'don pa de ni stobs bskyed pa de bcu rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ /rig pa dang / sngags kyi tshig bstan pa 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa'i tshe rgyal po chen po bzhi skrag
cing ba spu langs par gyur te/ g.yog brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te
thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi po 'di dag ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' sgrub
par bgyid pa ste/ gnyen bshes dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pas rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo chos smra ba dang / chos ston pa gang mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa de
dag la| bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rgyal po bzhis bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /de dag grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ ljongs sam/ ljongs kyi phyogs gang na
gnas kyang rung / khyim pa'am/ rab tu byung ba'ang rung ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rgyal po bzhi stobs dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pas rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi
bu mo de dag gi rim gro bgyi bar bdag cag spro'o/ /bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / spro ba dang / spobs pa dang / gzhan gyis gnod par mi bgyi zhing mi gtse bar bgyi ba'i slad du
bdag cag spro'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i sa phyogs der dpag tshad brgya kho ra khor yug tu lha'am/ klu'am/
gnod sbyin nam/ grul bum gyis glags mi rnyed do/ /de nas rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
bdag la bu dang gnyen bshes dang / /bran dang 'khor rnams ci mchis pa/ /de dang bdag cag grogs bcas pas/ /bdag po de dag rim gro bgyi/ /de nas rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang
gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag ni chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/ /chos las skyes pa chos kyi sprul/ /khyod kyi sras gang byang chub tu/ /zhugs pa de dag rim gro bgyi/ /
de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sangs rgyas gsungs pa'i mdo sde 'di/ /gang dag 'dzin par 'gyur ba rnams/ /de dag phyogs
bcu rnams su yang / /bdag gis kun tu bsrung bar bgyi/ /de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gang dag byang chub phyir brtson pa/ /
de la ci 'dra 'os pa yi/ /de 'dra'i mchod par bgyi ba ni/ /sems can kun gyis mi nus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bden pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba des
rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gdugs gsol nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to/ /de bzhin gshegs las bdag nyid kyis/ /chos kyi rnam grangs gzung bar bgyi//
pha rol la yang bstan par bgyi/ /bdag gi bsam pa de 'dra'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag sems dang / /sngon gyi spyod pa ci 'dra mkhyen/ /ji ltar bdag gi sems 'dud pa/ /bdag ni 'jig
rten rnams 'dren gyur/ /sangs rgyas dpag med skyob pa la/ /bdag gis gdugs 'di phul ba yis/ /bdag ni thub pa khyod 'dra bar/ /spyi gtsug ltar yang mi gdar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas
skyes bu dam pa yang / /bdag gi byams pas bltas pa yis/ /yongs su dag pa'i mig thob ste/ /rgyal ba ma pham blta bar bgyi/ /ye shes pha rol phyin pa yi/ /ston pas de nas lung bstan te/ /
khyod ni 'di nas phyi dus na/ /dga' ldan du yang skye bar 'gyur/ /dga' ldan nas ni shi 'phos nas/ /rgyal ba byams pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /bskal pa stong phrag nyi shur ni/ /mchod pa byas
nas 'byung bar 'gyur/ /khyod ni rab tu byung nas kyang / /tshangs par spyad pa rab spyad de/ /bskal pa bzang 'dir gang byung ba/ /bdag po de dag mthong bar 'gyur/ /thams cad la yang
mchod byas te/ /tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas ni/ bskal pa bye ba drug cu na/ /de nas khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni legs brgyan pa/ /rin chen gdugs zhes bya bar ni/
byang chub sems dpa' sha stag la/ /khyod ni chos rnams ston par 'gyur/ /tshe yi tshad ni bskal par 'gyur/ /sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i dam chos kyang / /
ma 'dres bskal pa byed du gnas/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin g.yog brgya stong phrag du ma dang bcas pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang chos smra ba mdo sde 'di 'chang ba de dag bsrung ba dang / yongs su bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /bsnyen bkur dang / rim gro'ang bgyi'o/ /gang na chos kyi rnam
grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba'am/ klog pa der ci nas kyang chos smra ba de'i stobs dang / mthu dang / chos kyi mtshams sbyor ba spobs par 'gyur bar bdag 'khor dang bcas te chos
nyan du mchi'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi bu sped byed ces bya ba des do shal rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa de bzhin gshegs pa la phul nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di
dag gsol to/ /thub pa bdag 'dir mngon sum ste/ /ji ltar khyod kyis sngon spyad pa/ /de bzhin bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi/ /ye shes tshol bas bsgrub par bgyi/ /khyod kyis sngon chad ma
stsal cing / /yongs su ma btang ci ma mchis/ /bdog pa thams cad gtong ba yi/ /bdag kyang rjes su bslab par bgyi/ /khyod kyi mdo sde 'di yang ni/ /'jig rten mgon las mngon
du blangs/ /yang dang yang du bshad par bgyi/ /bdag po khyod la bgyis par gzo/ /mdo sde 'di la su dga' ba/ /de dag bdag gi ston pa 'dra/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas chos 'tshal
bas| |de la rtag tu rim gro bgyid/ /dam pa'i chos rnams yongs su bsrung / /mgon po nyan thos mi nus te/ /phyi dus 'jig pa chen po'i tshe/ /bdag gis yongs su bsrung bar bgyi/ /mgon
po bdag kyang dbugs dbyung gsol/ /lha rnams the tshom gcad du gsol/ /thub pa khyu mchog khyod 'dra bar/ /ji srid yun gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /kun mkhyen ye shes mkhas pa
yi| |bde bar gshegs pas de lung bstan/ /nga ni ci 'dra de 'dra bar/ /khyod kyang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /bskal pa bye ba phrag stong dang / /bskal pa bye ba brgya yi tshe/ /'jig
rten du ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /ming ni ye shes 'byung zhes bya/ /byang chub zhi ba thob nas kyang / bdud rnams rab tu btul nas ni/ /sems can bye ba brgya stong rnams/ /byang chub la yang
'god par 'gyur/ /de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag bsam gtan la gnas pa'ang btang ste/
rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par ston pa de la chos nyan du mchi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa ni 'di las skyes te/ bcom
ldan 'das/ bdag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la bsnyen bkur dang / rim gro bgyi bar spro'o/ /de dag ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis rim gro bgyi ba dang / mchod
par 'os pa lags so/ /de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag pos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge slong dang
ni dge slong ma/ /dge bsnyen dang ni dge bsnyen ma/ /gang rnams mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa/ /skye bo kun gyi mchod rten de/ /gal te mdo sde 'di la ni/ /sems can gcig 'ga'
btsud na yang / /'gro ba'i mgon po bdag spro'o/ /chos smra ba ni de dag la/ /khri stan gang la de mchis te/ /mdo sde 'di ni rab ston par/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad
du| |me tog dgram par bdag spro'o/ /gang gi lag nas mdo sde 'di/ /phyi ma'i dus na thos par 'gyur/ /de la a la la zhes ni/ /legs smras legs zhes brjod par bgyi/ /
gang na mdo sde 'di mchis par/ /me yi phung pos gang ba yi/ /bye ba snyed kyis zhing brgal nas/ /skyo mi 'tshal bar mchi bar bgyi/ /rin chen phung po ri rab tsam/ /dga' bzhin
du ni phul nas kyang / /sangs rgyas kyi yang lam sbyong ba/ /mdo sde 'di ni mnyan par bgyi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba 'di lta bu mdzad de//
rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta bur mngon par 'dus byas pas bdud sdig to can dpung gi stobs bzhi dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag dpung dang bcas/ g.yog dang bcas pa 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan
sngar dam bcas te/ gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i ljongs kyi phyogs der chos nyan pa dang / chos smra ba dag la bdud kyi las mi bgyid pa'i steng du bsrung ba
dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar yang bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od gser gyi kha dog lta bus sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di khyab par mdzad de/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ skyes bu dam pa dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa de dag gi dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs
'di de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs so/ /'jam dpal/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ji srid du dzam+bu gling 'dir spyod par 'gyur ba yun de srid du dam pa'i chos nub par mi
'gyur ro/ /de nas 'khor de dag thams cad dga' mgu rangs yid bde bar gyur nas spos thams cad dang / phreng ba thams cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang / me tog thams cad
dang / phye ma thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par gtor nas tshig kyang 'di skad du/ e ma'o/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dzam+bu'i gling na yun ring du gnas pa dang / rgyas par
gyur cig ces 'dzer to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
bzung ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis bzung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung ba dang /
bcang ba dang / bklags pa dang / yang dag par rab tu bstan pa'i phyir khyod la yongs su gtad do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tam/
'chang ngam/ klog gam/ gzhan dag la ston tam/ yi ger bris pa la mchod pa bgyid na de bsod nams ji tsam zhig bskyed par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa| yi ge dang / nges pa'i tshig ji snyed kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis
bsnyen bkur byas pa bas/ gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / bzung nas kyang gzhan la ston pa dang / klog pa de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed
do| |kun dga' bo/ gang gis dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di glegs bam du bris te/ mchod na des tshe 'di nyid la gter 'thob pa bcu
'thob bo/ /bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan rab tu thob pas sangs rgyas mthong ba'i gter dang / lha'i rna ba rab tu thob pas chos nyan pa'i gter dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun
rab tu thob pas dge 'dun mthong ba'i gter dang / rin po che'i lag pa rab tu thob pas zad mi shes pa'i longs spyod kyi gter dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs
pas gzugs kyi gter dang / g.yog mi phyed pas g.yog gi gter dang / gzungs rab tu thob pas thos pa'i gter dang / spobs pa rab tu thob pas dran pa'i gter dang / pha rol kyi
rgol ba tshar gcod pas mi 'jigs pa'i gter dang / sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bas bsod nams kyi gter ro/ /yang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
bstan pa na byang chub sems dpa' sa ya khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to/ /sems can dpag tu med pa byang chub
la rab tu zhugs so/ /sems can tshad med pa'ang len pa med par rnam par grol lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to//
bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam
grangs 'di'i ming chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /sangs rgyas kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /tshangs
pa khyad par sems kyis kun dris pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /'jam dpal gyis bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
nas| 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / tshangs pa khyad par sems dang / bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu mnyam par nyid la gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dra ba
can gyi 'od dang / gnas brtan 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang /
mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis zhus pa

zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkya pra b+ha dang / d+harmA pA la dang / dzi na mi tra dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de d+harma tA shI la dang / bar zhus kyi lo tsA ba

ban+de de ben tra rak+Shi ta dang / ku mA ra rak+Shi ta la sogs pas zhus shing gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya su bi krAn+ta tsin+ta de ba pu tra pa ri pr-its+tshA nA ma ma hA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/
'phags pa lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis
thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin kyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong khri'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / 'jig rten
gyi khams gzhan dag nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag rab tu mang po dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / de las gzhan pa'i lha'i bu
rnams dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la sogs pa klu'i 'khor mang po rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po lus ngan la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi 'khor mang po rnams dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal
po stobs chen la sogs pa nam mkha' lding gi 'khor mang po rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi 'khor mang po rnams dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la
sogs pa mi 'am ci'i 'khor mang po rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po lag bzang la sogs pa lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor mang po rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa rnams
dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu stong phrag mang po'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu 'bum phrag du ma'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / rgyal po
gsal rgyal 'khor stong phrag du ma dang bcas pa dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de dag la sogs pa 'khor rnam
bzhi mang po rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to/ /de'i tshe na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go /lha'i bu byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa rab rtsal sems kyang 'dus par gyur te 'dug go /de nas lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis 'khor
phal po che de 'dus par rig nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba
btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams lags/
ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtsams pa thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams
dag gis mngon par 'phags pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyis chags pa ma mchis par spyod pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis mun pa dang bral ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor rnams kyi nang du 'jigs pa dang
bral ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thos pas don la rton pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten
tshul gyis chos la rton pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba rnams lags/ ji ltar
na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams la chos smra ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams kyis mngon
par 'phags pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad kyis thub par dka' ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po blo gros gting dpag dka' ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mi gos pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gting dpag dka' zhing zab mo la spyod pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ston pas dbang po la mkhas pa
rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas pa dang ma 'dres pas rnam par thar pa'i sgor gnas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i nga rgyal can tshar gcod pa'i slad du snrel zhir bsgrub pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po las kyi bgyi pa thams cad kyi rgyu la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral zhing rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la
mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa dag la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa yongs su dag pas brtul zhugs grub pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe 'gras pa'i sems ma mchis
shing bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad mngon par
'du bar 'gyur ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srog chags thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la rmas pa ma mchis pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab dag la rgya mtsho lta bu rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la dbang sgyur bas dbang phyug tu gyur pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgyi ba thams cad la slob dpon du gyur
pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du kha na ma tho ba ma mchis shing yon tan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa rnams lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu rab rtsal sems la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab rtsal sems/ legs so/ /legs so/ /lha'i bu/ khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad
las mngon par 'phags pa/ 'jig rten gyi yongs su 'dren pa/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/ bskal pa grangs med pa nas go cha bgos pa/ brtson 'grus shin tu brtan pa/ ded dpon chen po/ sems can
dpag tu med pa'i don byed pa/ sems can dpag tu med pa thams cad kyang bde ba la rab tu 'god pa la mkhas pa/ yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi don du de bzhin gshegs pa la
yongs su zhu ba ni yang khyod legs so/ /lha'i bu/ de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis
yon tan gyi khyad par de dag dang / gzhan dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur ba ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/ /lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol te bcom
ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi
'jog pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thabs la mkhas pas mngon par bsgrub pa'i shes rab dang / snying rje chen pos mngon par bsgrub pa'i byams pa dang / don dang / chos kyis mngon par
bsgrub pa'i spobs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi rnam pas mngon par bsgrub pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga po dag ste/ lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag
dang ldan na theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yin no/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ thabs la mkhas pa mngon par sgrub par byed pa yi/ /mngon sum shes rab rtogs par khong
du chud gyur cing / /thams cad skyabs phyir snying rje chen po yangs pa la/ gnas pa'i byams pa mngon par sgrub par byed gyur la/ /don dang chos la shin tu mkhas par 'gyur ba yi/ so so yang
dag rig la spobs pa thob gyur la/ /byang chub lam la mngon shes dag gis rnam rtse na/ /des ni gzhan gyi dring la 'jog par mi 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi
dang ldan na brtsam pa thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ phyir mi ldog pa'i brtson 'grus dang / bsam pa dag pa'i brtul ba dang / byang chub la 'dun pa drag po dang
ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub pa la yid yongs su mi skyo ba dang ldan pa ste/ lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na brtsam pa
thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa yin no/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ brtson 'grus brtan zhing rab tu gnas par med gyur cing / /bsam pa rnyog pa med cing yongs su dag gyur la/ /sangs

rgyas ye shes don phyir 'dun pa grags ldan zhing / /sangs rgyas chos rnams 'dod cing rtag tu yongs mi skyo/ /gang la chos bzhi rgya chen khyad par de yod pa/ /de ni byang chub lam du mngon 'byung brtan
'gyur zhing / /byang chub yan lag mthil bzhag pa bzhin gyur la/ /ring po mi thogs 'jig rten gsum gyi chos rgyal 'gyur/ /lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
bzhi dang ldan na bsod nams dag gis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms par byed pa dang / sems
can gang dag byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa de dag byang chub tu sems bskyed du 'jug pa dang / sprul pa lta bur dus gsum yongs su bsngo ba dang / byang chub kyi sems
dang ma bral bas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mkhas pa gang dag shes rab pha rol phyin 'doms
shing / /byang chub zhugs pas byang chub sems 'dzin 'jug byed pa/ /gang dag byang chub zhugs pas dus gsum yi rang zhing / /yid dang ma bral sprul 'dra byang chub 'dod byed pa/ /dge ba
gang yin cung zad byed pa thams cad ni/ /thams cad mkhyen nyid sems la rten par byed pa yin/ /lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na ye shes kyis chags pa
med par spyod pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ shes pas byis pa'i bya ba rnams byed cing nga rgyal gyis byas pa rnams mi byed pa dang / chos thams cad rkyen las rag las shing byin gyis rlob pa
med la gang zag dang bral bar shes pa dang / stong pa nyid spyod yul du gyur cing sems can thams cad mi gtong ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa dang / chags pa thams cad las yang dag par
'das shing skye mched drug yongs su shes pa srung ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo / /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ shes pas las byed de dag nga rgyal yod min zhing / /brten la mkhas pa
yin zhing de dag lta med la/ /stong nyid spyod yul de dag sems can mi gtong zhing / /chags pa kun las 'das shing phyi nang gnas pa med/ /chos mchog bzhi po de la shin tu rab gnas pa/ /shes
pas pha rol phyin cing chags med spyod pa yin/ /lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na shes rab kyi mun pa dang bral ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe
na| thos pas ngoms pa med cing tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor ba dang / zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos ston pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa shes par bya ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa
thams cad la sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog pa dang / tshul gcig la 'jug pas thams cad kyi 'jug pa la 'jug pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo / /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de dag thos 'tshol
ngoms med tshul bzhin rtogs byed cing / /de mnyam ston cing klog 'dzin rnyed pa 'tshol mi byed/ /nyon mongs sprin 'dra sgyu ma rmi lam lta bur blta/ /chos nyid tha dad mi byed de dag tshul gcig
'jug /tshe bdag chos bzhi de brten khyad par thob 'gyur zhing / /shes rab sgron 'das mun bsal zla ltar 'jig rten rgyu/ /lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
bzhi dang ldan na 'khor rnams kyi nang du 'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thos pa thams cad 'dzin pa'i gzungs thob pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi the
tshom gcod pa'i spobs pa thob pa dang / sems can thams cad la bdag med pa ston pa'i snying rje chen po dang / bdud dang nyon mongs pa dang bral ba mngon
par shes pa'i ye shes kyi go cha bgos pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo / /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ thos kun chud mi za bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs thob cing / /de dag spobs ldan
sems can som nyi gcod par byed/ /snying rjes chos 'di thams cad bdag med ston byed cing / /mngon shes shes pa'i go bgos bdud kyis mi nyams la/ /byang chub sems dpa'
chos bzhi de dag gis 'jug na/ /'khor kun nang du song yang de la 'jigs pa med/ /lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na thos pas don
la rton pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thos pas thams cad mi 'dzin pas thos pa dang mi ldan zhing sgrub pa nyams pa'i byis pa thams cad yongs su spong ba dang / yi ge dang
sgra dang / skad dang / tshig gi lam thams cad mngon du rnam par shes par bya ba'i phyir/ brag ca dang mtshungs pa nyid du khong du chud pa dang / don 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir thos pa
yongs su 'tshol zhing dga' mgur bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa dang / brjod du med pa'i don la 'jug cing brjod pa'i don ma yin pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo / /de la 'di
skad ces bya ste/ ji tsam mang du thos kyang don la mi rtog pas/ /byis pa thos dang mi ldan rtag tu sgrub chos nyams/ /srid gsum sgra skad dbyangs dang tshig lam gang yod pa/ /brag ca 'dra
bar de las don ldan sgra thos nas/ /don nyid rtogs shing dga' mgur nyes kun phyir mi 'jug /chos nyid 'di ni don mchog yin te brjod du med/ /'di ni don dang sgra skad thos
par gyur pa las/ /'gro ba rnams su 'gro bar byed cing 'gro bar 'gyur/ /lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis chos la
ston pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bre mo gtam byed pa rnams la chos ston pa dang / skye bo phal po che 'dus pa dag la 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba chen po dag la
rjes su yi rang zhing byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang / 'du 'dzi thams cad la dben par gzhol ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo / /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang tshe skye bo mang
po'i dbus su son gyur pa/ /der ni mkhas pas chos kyi gtam la 'jug par bya/ /skye bo mang po 'dus par gyur pa'i tshogs rnams la/ /'chi bar 'gyur ba'i 'du shes rnam par
bsgom par bya/ /des ni bag yod gzhan gyi gtong ba rnam lnga yi/ /gtong la yi rangs byas nas byang chub bsngo bya zhing / /gang tshe 'du 'dzi dag dang phrad par gyur pa'i tshe/ /der ni
dben par gzhol bar rab tu 'dod par bya/ /lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang / thos pa bsgrub pa snying por byed pa dang / ji skad smras
pa de bzhin du byed pa dang / rang bzhin gyis bdag med pa la 'jug pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo / /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ nyam nga gnod par gyur kyang byang chub sems
mi gtong / /de dag skyob pa'i chos thos sgrub pa snying por byed/ /bka' blo bde mthun ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed/ /mkhas pa de dag chos kun rang bzhin bdag med 'jug /
de ltar brtson pa'i shes ldan smras bzhin byed 'gyur zhing / /rtag brtson mi 'dor rjes mthun bdag med ci yang med/ /rtag tu snyan pa'i phreng ba phyogs bcur grags 'gyur zhing / /
de ltar chos smra de dag chos kyi shes pas 'phags/ /lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na sems can rnams la chos smra ba rnams yin
te| bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag nyid sgrub pas gnas shing sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / bdag nyid dul ba dang / bsrung ba dang / grol ba dang / brtul ba dang /
yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing sems can gzhan dag dul bar bya ba dang / bsrung ba dang / dgrol ba dang / gdul ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir chos
ston par byed pa dang / bdag nyid yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsam pa nges par gyur cing sems can rnams kyang theg pa chen po la rab tu 'god par byed pa dang /
bdag nyid chos 'dod cing chos 'dod pas gzhan dag la'ang ston par byed pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo / /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sgrub pa snying por byed cing 'gro la
chos ston la/ /dul bsrung legs btul shin tu mya ngan 'das gnas kyang / /gang dag ma dul ma bsrungs ma btul mya ngan las/ /ma 'das de dag chos kyi dkon mchog
'byor par 'dzud/ /de dag byang chub sems la bsam pa nges gyur cing / /theg pa de la 'gro ba rnams kyang 'god par byed/ /rtag tu chos 'dod don ldan bla ma gus
byed cing / /sems can rnams la de dang mthun pa'i chos rnams ston/ /lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na mngon par shes pa
rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yang dang yang du tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi'i gnas pa dang / rtag par rgyun du rab tu dben par gnas
pa dang / chos zab mo la bzod pa dang / lus dang / sems mnyam pa nyid du shes pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo / /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
tshangs pa'i gnas pa dag la rtag tu rab gnas shing / /dben par gnas pa la yang dga' ba skyed byed la/ /shes pas zab mo'i bzod las nges pa thob gyur cing / /mkha'
dang mnyam pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur pa ste/ /de ltar mngon par brtson pa'i 'jig pa med pa rnams/ /mngon shes lnga po dag gis mngon par 'phags gyur cing / /
de dag sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar 'dug 'dra la/ /sems can mang po rnams kyang yongs su smin byed 'gyur/ /lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
chos bzhi dang ldan na bdud thams cad kyis thub pa dka' ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang / sems
can thams cad mi gtong ba'i snying rje chen po dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcod pa'i brtson 'grus dang / thabs la mkhas pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i pha rol
tu phyin pa drug ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo / /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mtshan med stong pas nges pa'i bsam gtan bzhi bsgom zhing / /sems can yongs su skyabs phyir
rtag tu snying rje ldan/ /dkon mchog gsum rgyun mi gcod brtson 'grus thob gyur cing / /kun tu thabs ldan pha rol phyin pa drug la 'jug /de ltar spyod mkhas blo ldan che bdag yid gzhungs pa/ /
de dag bdud bzhi dag las yang dag 'das gyur cing / /bdud kyi lcags kyus zin pa'i 'gro ba mgon med rnams/ /mya ngan 'da' bar 'gro ba'i lam la 'god par byed/ /lha'i bu/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos bzhi dang ldan na blos gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos zab mo'i tshul la 'jug pa dang / rtag tu don dang ldan
zhing bsnyen par dka' ba dang / rtag tu yid byung zhing chos sems par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes sgrib pa med pa la sems kyis nges par rtogs par byed pa ste/ chos bzhi po de
dag dang ngo / /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ zab mo'i chos kyi tshul la zhugs par gyur pa dang / /rtag tu don dang ldan zhing bsnyen par dka' 'gyur la/ /rtag tu yid byung chos la bsam pa zhugs
gyur cing / /sems kyis nges par rtogs par byed pa gang yin pa'i/ /mkhas pa theg pa che la brten pa rab gnas pa/ /blo rnams dag gis gting dpag dka' bar rab 'gyur zhing / chags pa med
pa'i ye shes yang dag sgrub byed pa/ /de phyir blo rnams dag gis gting dpag dka' ba yin/ /lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis
mi gos pa rnams yin te/ /brgyad gang zhe na/ rnyed pa dang / snyan pa dang / bstod pa dang / bde bas khengs pa med pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / mi snyan pa dang /
smad pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis zhum pa med pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir phung po rnams la yongs su spyod par byed pa dang / phung po yongs su shes
pa srung zhing dben par lta ba ste/ chos brgyad po de dag dang ngo / /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ rnyed dang snyan dang bstod dang bde ba kun thob kyang / /de dag la ni nam yang khengs par
'gyur ba med/ /ma rnyed mi snyan smad dang sdug bsngal thob gyur kyang / /de dag pad+ma bzhin du chags med 'jig rten spyod/ /sems can smin par bya phyir phung po yongs su spyod cing / /
phung po sgyu ma gsog 'dra ya ma brlar shes pa/ /sems can phan bde'i don du 'jig rten spyod byed kyang / /'jig rten chos kyis mi gos tshul khrims spos ngad ldan/ /lha'i bu/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na gting dpag dka' zhing zab mo la spyod pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag la bdag med pa dang / sems
can la sems can med pa dang / chos dben pa dang / shes pa chags pa med pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo / /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ bdag la bdag med nyid du yongs
su shes gyur cing / /sems can sems can med par rjes su rtogs gyur la/ /chos rnams dben pa nyid du yongs su shes gyur cing / /mkha' la lag bzhin shes rab chags pa yod
min pa'i/ /dpa' rnams zab mo dag la yongs su spyod byed la/ /spyad pa med la rtag tu spyod par byed gyur cing / /'dzin dang kun 'dzin kun dang rnam par bral gyur pas/ /sems can
dag pa de dag de phyir gting dpag dka'/ /lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na chos ston pas dbang po rnams la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi
gang zhe na/ mngon par shes pa thob pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa dang / shes rab rno ba dang / sngon gyi smon lam rnam par dag pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo / /
de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni rab tu thob gyur cing / /shes pas so so yang dag rig pas mi zad gyur/ /rtag tu shes rab rnon por gyur cing sngon yang ni/ /yang
dag bsags pa yongs su dag pa thob gyur pa/ /sems can rnams kyi dbang po yongs su shes byas nas/ /de dang 'dra ba'i chos rnams yongs su ston par byed/ /de dag bstan pa
'bras bu med pa ma yin te/ /de phyir mya ngan 'das nas mya ngan 'da' bar byed/ /lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na 'dus ma byas dang
ma 'dres pas rnam par thar pa'i sgor zhugs pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid spyod yul du gyur cing / lta ba'i 'ching bas bcings
pa'i sems can rnams thar bar byed pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la gnas shing rnam par rtog pa spyod pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byad pa dang / smon pa med pa
la gnas zhing sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsam bzhin du skye ba len pa dang / thabs la mkhas shing shes rab kyi nges par byung ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang
ngo| |de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ stong nyid spyod yul de dag ltas bcing grol byed cing / /mtshan med gnas shing sems can 'di dag yongs smin byed/ /smon pa med la gnas
shing sems can smin bya'i phyir/ /bsam bzhin skye zhing gang du 'dod pa der skye 'gyur/ /shes rab thabs kyis nges byung rnam thar sgor gnas kyang / 'dus ma byas pa'i dbyings
ni dus min thob mi byed/ /lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na lhag pa'i nga rgyal can tshar gcod pa'i phyir snrel zhir bsgrub pa la mkhas
pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings kun nas sgo yang dag par shes pa dang / chos thams cad sgrib pa med par mos pa dang / kun tu rtog pa'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i
nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su shes pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin can gyi chos thams cad la nem nur med pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo / /de la 'di skad ces
bya ste| sems mnyam chos kyi dbyings su nges par byung gyur cing / /de dag rnams kyis sgrib pa 'ga' yang mthong mi 'gyur/ /nyon mongs kun tu rtog pa'i rtsa las rab byung bar//
shes nas de las snrel zhir kun tu ston mi byed/ /chos 'di thams cad rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa dang / /ma skyes ma 'gag ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa yin/ /de dag kun mkhyen yongs
btsal mya ngan 'das gyur nas/ /lhag pa'i nga rgyal can dag tshar gcod byed pa yin/ /lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na las kyi bya ba thams
cad kyi rgyu la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ longs spyod chen po'i rgyu sbyin pa mi spong ba dang / mtho ris su skye ba'i rgyu tshul khrims mi spong ba dang / shes rab chen po'i rgyu
thos pa mi spong ba dang / bral ba'i rgyu sgom pa mi spong ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo / /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ longs spyod che rgyu sbyin pa mi spong de'i 'bras de/ /mtho ris skye
rgyu tshul khrims thob cing de'i 'bras de/ /shes rab nyon mongs 'joms rgyu thos pa de'i 'bras de/ /rnam grol rig rgyu sgom par byed cing de 'bras de/ /rgyu bzhi de la rtog brtson
mkhas pa de dag ni/ /byang chub snying por dbang bskur 'bras phyir nyin mtshan spyod/ /lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
bzhi dang ldan lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral zhing rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chad par smra ba ma yin pa dang / rtag par smra ba
ma yin pa dang / ma rig pa byang na rga shi'i bar du 'byung bar lta zhing bdag tu lta bar mi byed pa dang / ma rig pa 'gags na rga shi'i bar du 'gags par lta zhing srid pa
'gog par yang mi byed pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo / /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ nam yang rtag par mi lta chad par ltung mi byed/ /des ni chos rnams rkyen byung byed pa
po dang ni/ /tshor ba po med rang bzhin rnam par dag par shes/ /ma rig rtsa las rga shi'i bar du 'byung 'gyur ba/ /rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs te de 'gags rgyu dang ni/ /
rkyen zad de phyir phyin chad skye mi 'gyur zhes gsungs/ /lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i
thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la rag las par lta ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsags pa la skyo ba
med pa dang / 'khro ba'i sgo nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo yongs su 'tshol ba dang / sems can rnams kyi mos pa ji lta ba de lta bu'i mos pa thabs gyis nyams su myong bar byed
cing nyon mongs pa rnams kyis ma yin pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo / /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sangs rgyas byang chub 'di ni sems can rnams la rten/ dge ba gsog cing
'dod pas yongs su skyo ba med/ /'khor ba'i sgo nas mya ngan 'das pa yongs 'tshol zhing / /sems can ji bzhin mos pa thabs kyis yongs su shes/ /lha'i bu/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ longs spyod mi zad pa dang / chos ston pa
mi zad pa dang / mngon par shes pa thob pa dang / sems sa ltar mnyam pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo / /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de dag rnams kyi longs spyod rtag
tu mi zad cing / /rtag tu chos kyi mi zad rgya mtsho 'dra ba yin/ /de dag mngon shes lnga po mi zad rtag mi g.yo/ /rtag tu dran ldan bsam pas dang 'dra ba yin/ /mnyam med byang
chub phyir ni yang dag zhugs gyur cing / /mya ngan ma 'das gang la chos rnams de yod pa/ /de dag 'gro ba kun gyi nye bar 'tsho 'gyur zhing / /byang chub mchog phyir myur du nges
par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na 'jig rten thams cad mngon par 'du bar
'gyur ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhis nas pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa dang / bden pa bzhi shes pa dang / so so yang
dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo / /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po dag gis gnas byed cing / /bsdu ba'i dngos
po dag la rtag tu dga' byed la/ /bden pa bzhi po dag la 'jig med dpa' bo rnams/ /'gro bas ri mo byas shing mchod pa byas par 'gyur/ /so so yang dag rig
pa'i pha rol son gyur cing / /'chad dang klog pa dag la rtag tu brtson gyur la/ /pha rol bde bar gyur ba'i bde bas mgu byed na/ /de phyir de dag yid du 'ong zhing sdug par
'gyur/ /lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang lan na srog chags thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/
thos pa dang tshul khrims dang ldan zhing tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / des shing 'grogs na bde ba dang / dben pa la dga' shing dbang po bsrung ba dang / bdag nyid bde
ba la lhag par chags pa med cing rtag tu kha na ma tho ba la lta ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo / /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ thos pa'i yon tan thob cing tshul khrims pha rol son//
tshul 'chos med cing rtag tu des la brtul zhugs bzang / /nags dang nags rab gnas shing dbang po sdom byed la/ /dran ldan bdag pa de mi ltos kha na ma tho ste/ /gang la
rtag tu dge ba'i yon tan de yod pa/ /de dag rtag tu sems can phan phyir brtson 'grus zhing / /de dag sems can don yang rtag tu byed 'gyur la/ /de dag rtag tu byang chub phyir
ni yid gzhol 'gyur/ /lha'i bu/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na dge ba'i sbyor ba thams cad la smad pa med pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe
na| dad pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa dang / snying rje chen po phun sum tshogs pa dang / theg pa chen por yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa rnams
yin te/ bzhi po de dag dang ngo / /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de dag dad dang ldan la brtul ba brtan ldan zhing / /de dag brtson 'grus mthu dang stobs dang ldan pa yin/ /'gro ba
kun la byams dang snying rje che ldan zhing / /byang chub ched du yongs su bsngo la mkhas pa ste/ /de phyir dge ba kun la smras pa yod min zhing / /zla ba nya ba'i zla ba mkha' la skar ma
yi| |tshogs kyi dbus na gnas pa rnam par mdzes pa dag /yang dang yang du dge ba kun la rnam 'phel 'gyur/ /lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na shes rab dag la rgya mtsho lta bu rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang / sgrub pa snying por byed pa dang / blo
rab tu gnas pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa rdo rje ltar brtan pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo / /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mkhas pa de dag ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed/ /de
dag sgrub pa snying por byed cing blo rab gnas/ /gang dag brtson pa de dag rdo rje lta bu yi/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa dag dang ldan par 'gyur/ /mkhas pa gang dag chos bzhi
de dag ston byed pa/ /de dag rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen sten byed cing / /dam bcas rnams la snying por byed par 'gyur ba dang / /rtag tu sangs rgyas gsung yang 'dzin par
byed pa yin/ /lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na chos la dbang bsgyur bas dbang phyug tu gyur pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ ye
shes kyi stobs can rnams yin zhing nyon mongs pa'i stobs can rnams ma yin pa dang / sems la dbang sgyur ba rnams yin zhing bdud kyi dbang sgyur ba ma yin pa dang / gzungs
dang / spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin pa dang / 'bras bu yod par chos ston pa rnams yin te/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo / /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de dag ye shes stobs ldan
nyon mongs dbang mi 'gro/ shes rab stobs kyis blun spangs lta rnams kun tu bral/ /sems la dbang sgyur byed cing bdud bzhi spangs gyur la/ /spobs pa brtan par gyur cing gzungs
gyis 'khrug pa med/ /de dag ston pa 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur te/ /de phyir myur du dbang phyug nyid dang ldan par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
bzhi dang ldan na bya ba thams cad la slob dpon du gyur pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ nga rgyal med pa dang / bla ma la gus pa dang / bag yod pa dang / 'dun pa drag po ste/ chos bzhi
po de dag dang / /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ nga rgyal med cing bla mar gus pas gnas gyur la/ /kun nas bag yod byang chub mchog la 'dun drag cing / /bsam pa thag pas smon
cing rtag tu drang gyur la/ /slob dpon dpe mkhyud med pa rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur/ /mkhas pa 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i don mkhas shing / /tshul dang tshul ma yin pa'i
mkhas pas brtan pa rnams/ /'jig rten kun mdza' thams cad rtogs par khong du chud/ /de phyir 'gro ba spyi bor thal sbyar de la 'dud/ /lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing yon tan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na
mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par brtse ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa'i spobs pa dang / dge ba thams cad dang mi 'bral zhing bag chags dang
bral ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan zhing dbang bskur ba thob pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo / /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sems can dag pa rgya chen mngon
shes shes pas brtse/ /bde gshegs kun gyis dgongs pa mkha' 'dra'i spobs dang ldan/ /brtson 'grus thogs med mi dge bag chags kun spangs shing / /dge dang
ldan zhing dbang bskur thob par gyur pa ste/ /chos rnams de dag la ni rab tu gnas gyur pa/ /de dag kha na ma tho med pa'i yon tan ldan/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa
bsgrub pa 'di bstan pa na lha dang / mi rnams la srog chags sa ya nyis 'bum gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /byang chub sems
dpa' nyi khri lnga stong gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /lha dang / mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags 'bum ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing
dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos shing 'jig rten thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab
par yang gyur to/ /lha rnams kyis kyang lha'i me tog gi char rab tu phab cing / lha'i sil snyan dag gi sgra'ang byung bar gyur ro/ /klu rnams kyis kyang mu tig dmar po dang / klu'i me
tog gi char rab tu phab bo/ /lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gnod sbyin rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la lha'i mchod pa dag
gis mchod pa byas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang / a la la chos/ a la la chos/ a la la chos zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod nas mchod
