sems dpa' khor ba las kyang mi g.yo la de nyid las sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams tshol bar yang byed pa dang / bdud thams cad dang thun mong ma yin zhing spyod pa dman pa
rnams dang ma 'dres pa dang / sems can rnams spyod pa dman pa las phral zhing spyod pa rgya chen po la 'god par byed pa dang / don mthun par byed pa dang / mi dge ba thams
cad la mi bsngags brjod par byed cing 'dun pa bzlog pa dang / phyir zlog par byed pa dang / byang chub 'khor ba la gzhol bar shes par byed pa dang / 'khor ba mnyam pa nyid
kyis sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid du lta bar byed pa dang / 'khor ba las mi g.yo zhing gnas pa'ang mi byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i chos can
yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ gang gi tshe
byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par lta bar byed pa dang / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi bar shes
par byed pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i chos ston par byed pa dang / sems can dpag tu med pa me gsum gyis
'bar bar gyur pa rnams nye bar zhi bar byed cing yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la dang spyod par byed la/ gtan du yongs su mya
ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang mi byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can yin te/ thabs la mkhas
pa dang / thabs shes pa la nges par skyes pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / rjes su snying brtse ba dang ldan pa yin no/ /'jam dpal
gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags 'bum lhag tsam chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go /srog chags
drug khri ni len pa med pa zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i sems can rnams
kyis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri lnga stong gis ni mi zad pa'i rnam pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i gzungs so sor thob par gyur
to| |srog chags sa ya phrag gnyis dang lnga 'bum gyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /steng gi bar snang las kyang bcom ldan
'das dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mchod par bya ba'i phyir me tog gi char dag mngon par rab tu phab bo/ /de nas lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis 'jam
dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thabs dang / shes rab kyis nges par 'byung ba yin/ de nas 'jam
dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lha'i bu rab rtsal sems la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gang tshe sems ni chags med pa/ /bla med byang chub sems yin te/ /sems kyi rang bzhin
mngon sum pa/ /de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do/ /sems rnams bskyed pa thams cad ni/ /byang chub tu ni yongs bsngo zhing / /byang chub sems las rab rtas pa/ /de ni
thabs kyi mtshan nyid do/ /sems can thams cad bdag med cing / /mi bden ya ma brla gsog tu/ /gang tshe shes pas shes byed pa/ /de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do/ /gang
phyir sems can thams cad dag /byang chub phyir ni sbyin byed cing / /bsam pa thag pas sdud byed pa/ /de ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid do/ /gang tshe bdag dang byang chub dag/ gtan
du mthong bar mi byed cing / /'khor gsum yongs su dag gyur pa/ /de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do/ /nang dang yang na phyi rol dag /thams cad yongs su gtong byed cing / /sems
can kun la yongs bsngo ba/ /de ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid do/ /zhi zhing rab zhi gtsang dag cing / /tshul khrims rlom sems mi byed la/ /lus dang ngag yid zhi gyur pa/ /
de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do/ /tshul khrims la ni zhugs gyur cing / /gzhan yang tshul khrims sbyor byed la/ /sangs rgyas tshul khrims bsngo byed pa/ /de phyir thabs
zhes bya ba yin/ /chos rnams thams cad rab stong zhing / /bdag med bzod pa sgom byed la/ /lus dang sems kyis ma smras pa/ /de ni shes rab
pha rol phyin/ /lus kyis sbyor bar mi byed cing / /ngag dang sems kyis ma yin la/ /chos rnams kun la dben gyur pa/ /de ni shes rab pha rol phyin/ /sems can kun gyi khro ba
dang | |gsod dang 'ching ba bzod byed cing / /sems can de dag mi spong ba/ /de ni thabs kyi pha rol phyin/ /sems can yongs su smin bya'i phyir/ ba/sam gtan bde ba rab
spangs nas/ /grong dang yul 'khor snang byed pa/ /de ni thabs kyi pha rol phyin/ /tshu rol ma yin pha rol min/ /mthun pa'i pha rol rab gnas shing / /spros pa'i lta ba rgyun bcad
pa| |shes rab pha rol phyin rtogs yin/ /gang gis stong nyid rtogs gyur nas/ /de ni btang snyoms mi byed cing / /sems can stong nyid sbyor byed pa/ /de ni thabs kyi tshul yin
no| |sangs rgyas gzugs med mkha' 'dra bar/ /chos kyis sgo nas lta byed cing / /de tshe gzugs la zhen med pa/ /de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do/ /sangs rgyas mtshan nyid
mchod 'dod cing / /sangs rgyas bye ba mchod byed la/ /'dren kun mchod du 'jug byed pa/ /de phyir thabs zhes bya ba yin/ /chos rnams rdul med rdul bral zhing / /mkha'
dang mnyam pas mnyam gyur la/ /chos 'ga'ang 'dzin par mi byed pa/ /de ni shes rab pha rol phyin/ /chos ni yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ /lus dang srog ni 'dor byed cing / /
'jig rten kun gyis dben gyur ba/ /de ni thabs kyi sgo yin no/ /chos dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir/ /yang dag mtha' la rab gnas shing / /de bzhin nyid las mi g.yo ba/ /de
ni shes rab sgo yin no/ /gang gi chos nyid ci 'dra ba/ /sems can de 'drar shes byed cing / /de ltar rtog par byed pa'i mtha'/ /de ni shes rab pha rol phyin/ /chos kun 'chi 'pho yod
min zhing / /skye ba med par shes byed la/ /mi 'gro rgyug par mi byed pa/ /de ni shes rab pha rol phyin/ /sems can yongs su smin bya'i phyir/ /mkhas pas 'dod dang gzugs rnams
su| |bsam bzhin du ni skye byed pa/ /de dag thabs kyi yon tan yin/ /dgon pa gnas rab gnas byed cing / /nyon mongs med la rab gnas la/ /bsam gtan rnam thar rten byed
pa| |de dag shes rab mtshan nyid yin/ /grong dang yul 'khor rnams su ni/ /song nas snyan gtam ston byed cing / /mi zad zhum pa yod min pa'i/ /mkhas pa thabs la mkhas
pa yin/ /'jig rten gsum po thams cad las/ /skrag cing 'du 'dzi bsten med la/ /bdag nyid dul zhing zhi gyur pa/ /de ni shes rab pha rol phyin/ /'gro ba dag na 'dul chen
dang | |tshogs dang 'du 'dzin ji snyed pa/ /kun na snang ba de dag ni/ /thabs kyis smras pa med pa yin/ /brtan pa chags med spyod byed cing / /yi ge don
gnyer mi byed la/ /brjod med nges don don gnyer ba/ /de ni shes rab pha rol phyin/ /mkhas pa chags pa thams cad na/ /snang zhing chos rnams ston byed la/ /dkon
mchog gsum gyi bsngags brjod pa/ /de ni thabs kyi pha rol phyin/ /mngon shes shes la mkhas gyur cing / /zhi zhing dul la zag pa med/ /bdag med gzhag pa yod
min pa/ /de ni shes rab pha rol phyin/ /mngon shes dag la rnam 'phrul zhing / /zhing rnams bye bar 'gro byed la/ /sangs rgyas bye ba mang mchod pa/ /de ni thabs kyi
mtshan nyid yin/ /phung po sgyu ma 'drar shes shing / /nyon mongs dngos med shes byed nas/ /de dag bdud kun zhi gyur pa/ /de ni shes rab pha rol phyin/ /bdud rnams
thams cad ston byed cing / /bstan nas rgyal bar byed gyur la/ /de las sems can thar byed pa/ /de ni thabs kyi sgo yin no/ /stong nyid mtshan ma med pa dang / /smon par
byed pa yod min pa'i/ /rnam thar sgo la ston byed pa/ /de ni shes rab mtshan nyid yin/ /chags med sdang ba yod min zhing / /rmongs med shes pa'i spyod yul dang / /blang
med dor ba yod min pa/ /de ni shes rab mtshan nyid yin/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan zhing / /stong nyid rab tu sten gyur la/ /kun gyi pha rol son gyur pa/ /mnyam med 'gog
pa'i mtshan nyid yin/ /zag med brtul ba ma yin pa/ /de dag shes rab ldan 'gyur zhing / /'khor ba'i spyod yul de dag ni/ /sems can kun gyi grogs su 'gyur/ /bsod
nams tshogs kyis mi ngoms pa'i/ /mkhas pa thabs la mkhas pa yin/ /shes rab thabs la mkhas pa yi/ /yan lag gnyis ldan lam de ni/ /shes ldan byang chub sems
dpa' ste/ /des ni 'dren rnams nges par 'byung / /thabs dang mi ldan shes rab kyis/ /ma byung 'byung bar 'gyur ba med/ /shes rab med pa'i thabs kyis ni/ /mkhas pa
rab tu zhi mi 'gyur/ /shes rab dang ni thabs shes pa/ /de gnyis kun tu 'dres gyur cing / /gnyis ka zung du 'jug 'gyur na/ /des ni dam pa rtogs par 'gyur/ /gang dag
bgrod pa 'dir 'gro ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rab bsngags shing / /ye shes pha rol phyin 'gyur te/ /de ni chos rnams chos nyid do/ /de dag sangs rgyas spyod yul gyi/ /
chos dbyings dbyer med dga' byed cing / /sangs rgyas byang chub bla med pa'i/ /rdul med byang chub rtogs par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis 'jam dpal
gzhon nur gyur pa la/ gzhan yang / 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ byang chub kyi yul gang yin/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu
byang chub kyi yul ni rang gi yul dben pa nyid do/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ /'jam dpal/ byang chub kyi mtshan nyid gang yin/ 'jam gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ byang chub ni nam
mkha'i mtshan nyid do/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ /'jam dpal/ byang chub kyi mtha' gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ byang chub kyi mtha' ni stong pa nyid yin no/
lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ byang chub kyi gnas gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ byang chub kyi gnas ni chos thams cad kyi gnas yin no/ /lha'i bus
smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ byang chub kyi sgo gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ byang chub kyi sgo ni kun nas sgo yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ byang
chub kyi rtsom pa gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ byang chub kyi rtsom pa ni sems can thams cad bdag med pa'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ byang chub
ci dang mnyam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ byang chub ni chos thams cad mi skye ba dang mnyam mo/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ byang chub kyi bgrod pa gang yin/
'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ byang chub kyi bgrod pa ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa yin no/ /byang chub kyi bgrod pa ni 'gro ba med par 'gro ba dang / rgyu
ba med par 'gro ba yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ byang chub gang gi rgyu mthun pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ byang chub ni snying rje chen po'i rgyu
mthun pa yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ snying rje chen po gang gi rgyu mthun pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ snying rje chen po ni sems can thams
cad rab tu thar bar bya ba'i rgyu mthun pa yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ byang chub ga las btsal bar bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ byang chub ni
sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rjes su rtogs pa las btsal bar bya'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ nyon mongs pa rnams ga las btsal bar bya/ 'jam
dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ nyon mongs pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las btsal bar bya'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ci 'phags pa'i
lam nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas sam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ gal te 'phags pa'i lam gnyis su gyur pa zhig yin na ni 'phags pa'i
lam nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas par yang 'gyur ba zhig /lha'i bu/ 'phags pa'i lam ni gnyis su gyur pa med pa ste/ nyon mongs pa
tshol ba gang yin pa de nyid 'phags pa'i lam yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ji ltar na lam gyis lam gyi bya ba byas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i
bu| gang gi tshe btsal na nyon mongs pa rnams mi rnyed cing 'khor ba'ang mi rnyed/ mya ngan las 'das pa'ang mi rnyed pa de ltar na lam gyis lam gyi bya ba byas pa yin no/ /lha'i bus
smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam ni lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis
dang | phyin ci log bzhi dang / sgrib pa lnga dang / mi dge ba'i phyogs kyi chos thams cad do/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ci las bsams te de skad smra/ 'jam dpal gyis
smras pa/ lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can la sbyor ba yin pas sems can rnams kyang lta ba'i rnam pa dang / phyin ci log dang / sgrib pa dang / mi dge ba'i
chos rnams ma gtogs pa gzhan las btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ni gang gis sems can rnams rab tu phye ba'i lta ba'i rnam pa dang / phyin
ci log dang / sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa de dag nyid tshol bar byed de/ /de tshol bar byed na sems can yang mi rnyed/ nyon mongs pa rnams kyang mi rnyed do/ /ma rnyed na sems
can yongs su smin par bya ba la skyo bar mi 'gyur ba ste/ lha'i bu/ rnam grangs des na nyon mongs pa tshol ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam yin la/ sems can tshol ba'ang
byang chub sems dpa'i lam yin/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / nyon mongs pa tshol ba'ang byang chub sems dpa'i lam yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam
dpal| rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag byang chub sems dpa'i lam ma yin nam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ stong pa nyid ni btsal bar mi nus la/ mtshan
ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang btsal bar ni nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu/ de la ni sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa 'jug par mi 'gyur la gang la sems
dang | yid dang / rnam par shes pa 'jug par mi 'gyur ba de ni btsal bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ lam ji ltar mngon par rtogs par bya/
'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ yang dag pa'i lta ba gang dang mnyam pa log pa'i lta ba'ang de dang mnyam pa de ltar mngon par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni lam mngon
par rtogs pa yin no/ /yang dag pa'i rtog pa gang dang mnyam pa log pa'i rtog pa'ang de dang mnyam pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag gang dang mnyam
pa log pa'i ngag kyang de dang mnyam pa dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa log pa'i las kyi mtha' yang de dang mnyam pa dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba
gang dang mnyam pa log pa'i 'tsho ba'ang de dang mnyam pa dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol pa gang dang mnyam pa log pa'i rtsol ba'ang de dang mnyam pa dang / yang dag pa'i dran
pa gang dang mnyam pa log pa'i dran pa'ang de dang mnyam pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang dang mnyam pa log pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang de dang mnyam pa de ltar
mngon par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni lam mngon par rtogs pa yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ yang dag pa'i lta ba gang dang mnyam/ 'jam dpal gyis
smras pa/ lha'i bu/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / log pa'i lta ba ni stong pa nyid dang / dben pa nyid dang mnyam pa yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ stong pa nyid
dang / dben pa nyid tha dad du bya ba ci yod/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ nam mkha' dang / nam mkha' la tha dad du bya ba ci yod/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ tha dad
du bya ba cung zad kyang med do/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ de bzhin du stong pa nyid dang / dben pa nyid la'ang tha dad du bya ba cung zad kyang med do/ /lha'i bus smras pa/
'jam dpal/ tha dad du bya ba gang las rab tu phye ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ tha dad du bya ba ni mtshan ma dang / dmigs pa dang / 'du shes dang / spros pa
las rab tu phye ba yin te/ mtshan ma dang / dmigs pa dang / 'du shes dang / spros pa gang yin pa de'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid rjes su rtogs pa gang yin pa de la ni tha dad
du bya ba med do/ /lha'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen por ma zhugs pa'i chu la ni tha dad du bya ba yod kyi rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa'i chu la ni tha dad du bya ba med pa de
bzhin du/ lha'i bu/ chos kyi dbyings yongs su ma shes pa la ni chos la tha dad du bya ba yod kyi chos kyi dbyings yongs su shes pa la ni chos tha dad du bya ba med do/ /lha'i bus
smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ci chos kyi dbyings yongs su shes par nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ chos kyi dbyings ni yongs su shes par mi nus so/ /de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu/ chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba yin la/ chos kyi dbyings kyis ni chos kyi dbyings yongs su mi shes pa'i phyir ro/ /chos
kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba'i chos de dag la gnyis su med par shes pa de dag gang yin pa de ni yongs su shes pa zhes bya ste/ sems
gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i phyir de ni yongs su shes pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan gyi rnam par rig pa la gnas pa'i phyir de ni yongs su shes pa zhes bya'o/ /
lha'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' gzugs med pa'i snang ba la gzugs thams cad snang yang gzugs de dag ni nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid yin pa de bzhin du/
lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpas rang gis smras pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi sgo nas chos thams cad mthong yang chos de dag ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kho na yin no/
lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mgo smos pas go ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ mgo smos pas go ba'i rang
gi lta bas sems can thams cad kyi lta ba spang ba'i phyir chos ston par byed na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par spros
pas go ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ dben pa'i phyir bdag kyang gzhan du mi byed la/ bdag med pa'ang gzhan du mi byed na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/
'jam dpal/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi bkri ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos 'ga' yang khrid par mi
byed na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnas lhur len pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems
dpa' mtshan ma med pa'i gnas las g.yo bar mi byed na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ gang gis byang chub sems dpa' tshogs gsum po nges pa nyid dang / ma
nges pa nyid dang / log pa nyid du nges pa'i tshogs dag la snang bar 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ yod do/ /lha'i bus smras pa/
'jam dpal/ ji lta bu yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' nges pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la'o/ /ma nges pa ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs
rgyas kyis la'o/ /log pa nyid du nges pa ni de las sems can bsgral bar bya ba la'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ gang gis byang chub sems dpa' mi khom pa thob cing
khom pa ma thob pa'i rnam grangs yod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ yod do/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ 'o na ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mi khom
pa thob pa rnams la snying rje chen po skyed par byed cing sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir khom pa thob pa de dag kyang yal bar 'jog par
byed| 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ gang rnam par grol ba'i tshogs de dag ni khom pa thob pa yin pas de la ni byang chub sems dpar mi snang ngo / /lha'i bus
smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ khyod mi khom pa thob pa yin nam/ 'on te khom pa thob pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ kho bo ni khom pa thob pa'ang ma yin/ mi
khom pa thob pa'ang ma yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ci'i phyir/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ kho bo ni thob pa'ang ma yin/ yang dag par
thob pa'ang ma yin/ khom pa'ang ma yin/ mi khom pa'ang ma yin la/ khom pa dang / mi khom pa la chags par yang mi byed pa'i phyir ro/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam
dpal/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis ni bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad tshar gcod do/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la
ni phung po yongs su shes pa'ang med/ nyon mongs pa sel ba'ang med/ bdud las yang dag par 'das pa'ang med pa'i phyir ro/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/
nye bar sbyar bas gzhan mu stegs can rnams pham par byas so/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ 'di ltar 'di la mu stegs can thams cad kyi spyod pa med pa'i
phyir ro/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ chos kyi tog btsugs so/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ snang ba med pa dang / mun pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /lha'i bus
smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ 'dis ni chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor to/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ lta ba'i mtha' thams cad yongs su gcad pa'i phyir ro/ /lha'i bus
smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ chos bstan pa 'dis chos kyi snang ba ji snyed cig byas/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ gang dag la snang ba'ang med pa mun pa'ang med pa de
dag chos kyi snang bar byas so/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni dkon no/ /'jam dpal
gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ de de bzhin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ 'di la su dag mos par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ gang dag 'ching bas
rnam par 'khrug par mi 'gyur ba rnams so/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ 'ching bas rnam par 'khrug par mi 'gyur ba dag gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras
pa| lha'i bu/ gang dag 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa bsal ba'i sgo nas thar pa tshol bar mi byed pa dang /
gang dag 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa mnyam pa nyid kyi rnam par grol ba mnyam par 'gyur pa dag ste/ de dag gis ni 'ching
ba ma dmigs pas rnam par 'khrug pa'ang mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags lnga 'bum tsam gyis
byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ tshig 'di skad ces/ bdag cag gis kyang ci ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos 'di dag brnyes pa de bzhin du thob par gyur cig ces kyang smras so/ /lha dang / mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags 'bum lhag
tsam chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go /gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu drug khri ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems
rnam par grol lo/ /'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu brgyad khri'ang len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /srog chags dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang /
dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma nyi khri'ang len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa bdun khri nyis
stong gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyang dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yi rangs ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang /
dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o kun nas yongs grol ba'i/ /dmigs med chos ni legs par bshad/ /'jam dpal
gzhon nur gyur pa yis/ /shin tu legs par bshad par byas/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin
dang | nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa de dag gis lha dang / mi'i mchod pa dag byas te/ steng gi bar snang las kyang lha'i me
tog gi char dag kyang phab/ rin po che'i char dag kyang phab/ gos kyi char dag kyang phab/ bdug spos kyi char dag dang / spos chu'i char dag dang / phye ma'i char dag kyang phab bo/ /lha
rnams kyis steng gi bar snang las lha'i sil snyan brgya stong dag kyang rab tu gsil bar gyur to/ /dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang
rang rang gi 'byor pa ci bdog pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mchod pa byas so/ /thams cad dang ldan
pa'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang thal mo sbyar te tshig 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dad par mi bgyid pa de dag la ni sangs rgyas
'byung ba ma mchis lags so/ /gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong bar bgyid pa de dag la ni rab tu 'byung ba ma mchis lags so/ /gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs
'di bsgrubs te gnas par mi bgyid pa de dag la ni bsnyen par rdzogs par ma mchis lags so/ /de dag la ni 'phags pa'i bsnyen par rdzogs pas bsnyen par
rdzogs pa'ang ma mchis lags so/ /gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bgrod par mi mchi ba de dag la ni dge sbyong gi tshul ma mchis lags so/ /de dag la ni bram ze'i tshul
yang ma mchis lags so/ /gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la skrag par 'gyur ba de dag la ni thob pa'ang ma mchis/ mngon par rtog pa'ang ma mchis lags so/ /
gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan par bgyid pa dang / thos nas kyang mos par bgyid pa dang / len par bgyid pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / 'dzin par
bgyid pa dang / klog par bgyid pa dang / yi ger 'dri bar bgyid pa dang / snod 'tshal bar bgyid nas gzhan dag la'ang ston par bgyid pa dang / skyo ba ma mchis pa'i yid
kyis 'doms par bgyid pa dang / rjes su ston par bgyid pa dang / 'di la nan tan gyis sgrub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag kyang nan tan gyis sgrub du stsol ba dang / nyams
par mi bgyid pa de dag ni sems can dam pa dang / sems can chen po dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsrungs pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang / gting
rnyed pa dang / log par ltung ba'i rgyun bkum pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro'i sgo bkum pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang / dge ba'i bshes
gnyen rnams la shin tu gus pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bgyis pa gzo zhing bgyis pa tshor ba lags shing / de dag ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung
ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du zhugs pa lags te/ skyes bu dam pa de dag la ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba'ang
mchis lags so/ /de dag la ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'ang mchis lags so/ /de dag la ni 'bras bu mchis pa dang / khom pa dang / ldan pa lags so zhes kyang
gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na lha dang / mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags nyi khri nyis stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi
mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go /lha dang / mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags 'bum phrag brgyad ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems
rnam par grol lo/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / dge slong dang / dge slong
ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma sa ya phrag gnyis kyis ni byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /'di na gnas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas 'dus
pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lnga 'bum gyis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa tha dad pa gnyis stong tsam gyis ni gzungs
na tshogs so sor thob par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'bum gyis ni gzungs dri ma med pa so sor thob par gyur to/ /de dag las byang chub sems dpa' mang po dag /
byang chub sems dpa' byams pa/ khyod kyis byang chub thob pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur zhing mdo sde zab mo 'di lta bu dag nod pa dang / ston pa dang / 'dzin pa
dang | klog par yang 'gyur te/ de dag ni byams pa khyod nyid kyis byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di
skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / dam pa'i chos
yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du glegs bam du bgyis te 'chang ba dang / tha na lan 'ga' zhig nyan par bgyid pa dang / rna lam du grags par bgyid pa de dag bsod
nams ji tsam bskyed par 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byams pa/
khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa ni legs so/ /legs so/ /byams pa/ de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas
khyod la bshad par bya'o/ /byams pa/ nan gyis dper na/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi skye dgu las lha'am/ mi gang zhig gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
snyed dang bcas pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig la bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas par
gyur pa de bas ni gang gis mdo sde legs par gsungs pa 'di yi ger bris te 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la
ston par byed pa ches bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur te/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir ring por mi thogs par byang chub kyi snying por nye bar
'gro bar yang 'gyur ro/ /byams pa/ nga ni gang dag gis mdo sde 'di thos nas spong bar mi byed cing mos par byed pa dang / tha na glegs bam du 'dri bar byed pa de dag
kyang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyir mi ldog pa nyid du lung ston to/ /byams pa/ nga ni gang dag gi mdo sde zab mo 'di lta bu 'di ni ming tsam thos pa de dag kyang 'bras bu yod par
lung ston par byed na gang dag mos pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang ston par byed pa dag lta smos kyang ci dgos/ gang dag mdo sde 'di yi ger
'dri ba dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / klog pa dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang lhan cig tu gtam 'dri
bar byed pa dang / phebs par smra bar byed par 'gyur te/ de dag ni rtag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na
bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang de dag la ston par mdzad cing bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos
pa de ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'dra ba yin gyi/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zungs shig /gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher ston cig /kun dga' bos gsol
pa| bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci zhes bgyi/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ 'di'i ming ji skad bstan par bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jam dpal gyis bstan pa chos thams cad rnam par gtan la
dbab pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /de nas 'khor de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming thos nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
to| |bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas chos bstan pa mang du thos lags na ji ltar chos kyi rnam grangs
rab tu rnam par phye ste rgya cher bstan pa de lta bu'i chos ni nam yang ma byung lags so/ /bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs la dga' ba 'di lta bu thob pa ni sngon ma myong
lags te/ de lta lags pas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams kyi slad du chos kyi rnam grangs
'di ci nas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / sems can mos pa tha dad pa rnams kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg
pa tha dad pas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / de dag bde 'gror mchi bar bgyi bar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par byin gyis brlab tu gsol
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor bzhi po de dag gis gsol ba btab par thugs su chud nas phyogs bcur rnam par gzigs so/ /bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcur
rnam par gzigs ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sa gzhi chen po rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur cing / lha
dang | klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyang dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yi rangs pa dang /
spro ba dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas ci nas kyang phyi ma'i dus na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nub bar mi 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems can la dga' ba rnams dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la lha'i mchod pa dag byas shing steng gi bar snang las me tog gi char dag kyang
rab tu phab/ lha'i sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs dag kyang rab tu gsil cing blangs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la 'di skad ces/ nga dang /
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs so zhes go bar mdzad do/ /de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / byang chub sems dpa'
de dag dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yi rangs ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mchod
pa byas te/ rang rang gi gnas su dong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo
dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa lha'i bu rab
rtsal sems kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA warma dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sde la
sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya shrI ba su pa ri pr-its+tshA nA ma mahA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dpal dbyig
gis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg po chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
ldan 'das wA ra Na sI na drang srong smra ba'i ri dwags kyi nags na byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de
nas tshong dpon gyi bu dpal dbyig ces bya ba wa ra Na sI'i grong khyer chen po nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
la mgo bos phyag btsal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshong dpon gyi bu dpal dbyig gis bcom ldan 'das ga
la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas ji snyed cig 'das shing gshegs lag /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas dpag tu med grangs med pa 'das shing gshegs te/ dper na/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpag tu med grangs med pa skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dper na/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed do/ /tshong dpon gyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpag tu med grangs med pa da ltar bzhugs la 'tsho zhing gzhes te/ dper na/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed do/ /de skad
ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshong dpon gyi bu dpal dbyig gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar mi
brgya'am/ mi stong ngam/ mi 'bum gyis sngon 'bad de btsal bas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang 'bad de
btsal na ci'i slad du/ de mi thob/ mi rtogs kyi/ de'i slad du thugs brtse bar dgongs te las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpas ji ltar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar gnas par
bgyi ba dang / ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi ba bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la de ltar legs par bstan du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
tshong dpon gyi bu dpal dbyig la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /tshong dpon gyi bu/ legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod kyis rtog pa mdzes so/ /spobs pa dge'o/ /tshong
dpon gyi bu/ de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpas ji ltar bya ba dang / ji ltar gnas par bya ba dang / ji
ltar bsgrub par bya ba ngas khyod la bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ legs so zhes gsol te tshong dpon gyi bu dpal dbyig bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar nyan pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ tshong dpon gyi bu/ las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni nyin gcig bzhin du snying thag pa rus pa'i khong nas yid
la byas te/ sems can thams cad kyis bsams nas dus gsum du dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba mi gtang bar bya'o/ /tshong dpon gyi bu/ gzhan yang / las
dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni snying thag pa rus pa'i khong nas yid la byas te/ sems can thams cad kyis bsams nas dus gsum du dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su
'gro ba'i yi dam mi gtang bar bya'o/ /tshong dpon kyi bu/ gzhan yang / las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni snying thag pa rus pa'i khong nas yid la byas te/ sems can thams
cad kyis bsams nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du dkon mchog gsum gyis mi stong bar dus gsum du gsol ba gdab pa mi gtang bar bya'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams
cad du dkon mchog gsum bskal pa du mar gnas par dus gsum du gsol ba gdab pa mi gtang bar bya'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la bskal
pa du mar chos bstan par dus gsum du gsol pa gdab pa mi gtang bar bya'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la ci nus pa dang / ci lcogs pa dang / ji
ltar gsol ba 'debs pa bzhin du theg pa gsum la byang chub tu sems bskyed par dus gsum du gsol ba gdab pa mi gtang bar bya'o/ /'jig rten
gyi khams thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad myur zhing rings par yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar
dus gsum du gsol ba gdab ba mi gtang bar bya'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis byang chub gsum thob
par 'gyur bar dus gsum du gsol ba gdab pa mi gtang bar bya'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i sems can ngan 'gror skyes pa thams
cad ngan 'gro thams cad nas gdon par dus gsum du gsol ba gdab pa mi gtang bar bya'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i sems can
thams cad kyi sdig pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur bar dus gsum du gsol ba gdab pa mi gtang bar bya'o/ /'jigs pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur bar gsol ba gdab pa dang / sdug bsngal
ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa spong bar 'gyur ba dus gsum du gsol ba gdab pa mi gtang bar bya'o/ /'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs
rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos la sogs pa thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la dus
gsum du rjes su yi rang pa mi gtang bar bya'o/ /tshong dpon gyi bu/ gzhan yang las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni snying thag pa rus pa'i khong nas yid las byas te/ sems
can thams cad kyi bsams nas dus gsum du rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon pa dang / bdag nyid sdig pa spyod pa la rnam par smod pa dang / sdig pa spyod pa la bshung ba dang / sdig
pa las nges par 'byung ba dang / dge ba thams cad 'dod pa dang / dge ba thams cad blang ba dang / tshe rabs tshe rabs su'ang dkon mchog gsum la bsnyen bskur bya bar gsol
ba gdab pa dang / gcig tu nges par rnam par dag pa'i dge ba'i spyad pa spyod par gsol ba gdab pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya bar
gsol ba gdab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'thob par gsol ba gdab pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba gdab pa dang / bskal pa du mar chos bstan
bar gsol ba gdab pa mi gtang bar bya'o/ /tshong dpon gyi bu/ gzhan yang / las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni pha ma la gnod pa med pa dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / bran pho
dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / mdza' bo dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / rgan rabs la gnod pa med par ji ltar mos pa
dang | ci nus par dus dus su sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o/ /tshong dpon gyi bu/ gzhan yang / las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la gnas shing 'dug
pa dang / brtan por 'dug pa dang / mi lhod par 'dug par bslab par bya'o/ /gal te bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la slob mi nus na'ang / des bzhi'am/ gsum mam/ gnyis sam/
de'i nang nas bslab pa'i gzhi gcig tsam la'ang bslab par bya'o/ /gal te bslab pa'i gzhi gcig tsam la slob kyang mi nus na de sdig pa'i las mi dge ba gang dang / gang kun
tu spyod pa de la zhen pa ma yin pa dang / drag po ma yin pa'i sems dang / mi dga' bzhin pa dang / lhod pa dang / yang ba'i sems dang / don gyi dbang dang / dgos pa'i
dbang gis spyad par bya ste/ de mi dge ba bcu'i las khro ba'i dbang du gyur pa dang / 'khon du 'dzin pa'i dbang du gyur pa dang / dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i dbang du
gyur pas kun tu spyad par mi bya'o/ /kun tu spyad par 'dod pa na'ang rnam par smad par bya/ rnam par bshud bar bya'o/ /spyod cing 'dug pa na'ang rnam par smad par bya/ rnam
par bshung bar bya'o/ /spyad zin pa na'ang rnam par smad par bya/ rnam par bshung bar bya'o/ /so sor bshags par bya'o/ /nges par 'byung bar bya'o/ /legs pa dge ba ci'ang
rung ba zhig kun tu spyod pa na ni des ni de la sems zhen pa dang / drag po'i sems dang / tshim pa dang / mgu ba dang / lhod pa ma yin pa dang / yang ba ma yin pa dang / bar chad
med pa dang / dad pa dang / dga' ba dang / dang ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i dbang du gyur pa'i sems kyis kun tu spyad par bya'o/ /kun tu spyod par 'dod pa na'ang snying thag
pa rus pa'i khong nas yid la byas te/ sems can thams cad kyis bsams nas sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir dang / dgrol ba'i phyir dang / dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir
dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir bla na
med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/ /des dge ba kun tu spyod pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / de ltar byung ba thams cad la'ang snying thag
pa rus pa'i khong nas yid la byas te/ sems can thams cad kyis bsams nas mngon par bsdus te bzlums nas rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/ /rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog dang /
phul dang / gtso bo dang / rab dang / rab mchog dang / gya nom pa dang / dam pa dang / mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa dang / nam
mkha' dang / mnyam pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang / mnyam pa'i rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/ /rjes su yi rang nas kyang dge ba kun tu spyad pa de'ang sangs
rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos thams cad la dbul bar bya'o/ /phul nas kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du bya zhing sems
can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir dang / dgrol ba'i phyir dang / dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/ /des ka shi ka'i gos dang / tsan+dan dang / a ga ru'i bdug pa la sogs pa dang / yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs nyams su myong ngam/ 'dod pa'i yon
tan lnga la dga' mgur spyod dam/ lam du 'gro ba'am/ 'du byed dam/ bya ba thams cad byed na'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'dun pa dang / dad pa
dang | don du gnyer ba dang / smon pa de 'ba' zhig rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rjes su dran par bya'o/ /yid la bya'o/ /bsgom par bya'o/ /lan mang du bya'o/ /de ltar byas na de
sdig pa mi dge ba kun tu spyod pa rnams la sems lhod par 'gyur/ yang bar gyur/ chung bar gyur/ srab par 'gyur/ gsog tu 'gyur ro/ /legs par dge ba'i las kun tu spyod pa rnams la
ni sems zhen par 'gyur/ drag par 'gyur/ mi lhod par 'gyur/ mi yang bar 'gyur/ mi chung bar 'gyur ro/ /de sdig pa mi dge ba kun tu spyod pa rnams la lhod par 'gyur/
yang bar 'gyur/ chung par 'gyur/ srab par 'gyur/ gsog tu 'gyur/ med par 'gyur ba dang / legs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba kun tu spyod pa rnams la sems zhen par
gyur pas srid pa'i 'gro ba gang dang phrad pa dag tu chung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'khu ba dang / gsod pa dang / 'ching ba dang / rnam par 'tshe ba gang yin pa rnams legs par
spongs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa'i khongs su gtogs pa'i sems can mtha' yas mu med pa rnams kyi thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa dus
mtha' yas par nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal dang / mi sdug pa dang phrad pa dang / sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal
dang | 'dod pas phongs pa'i sdug bsngal dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal
dang | 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi sdug bsngal gcad par bya ba dang / dgag par bya ba dang / rnam par zhi bar bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang / byams pa'i sems
su gyur pa dang / snying rje chen po'i sems su gyur pa dang / go cha chen po bgos pa dang / theg pa chen po la zhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po la mos pa dang / sangs
rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi gdung mi 'chad par nges par byed pa'i phyir sdig pa mi dge ba kun tu spyod pa rna yongs su 'grib par 'gyur ba dang / chung bar 'gyur ba
nas srab pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/ /legs pa dge ba kun tu spyod pa rnams ni 'phel bar 'gyur ba nas dpag tu med pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa
gsog cing sgom pa'ang yongs su rdzogs pa dang / sra ba dang / brtan pa dang / rdo rje lta bur 'gyur ro/ /tshong dpon gyi bu/ de lta na las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de go rims
'di lta bus mthar gyis srid pa 'di dang / srid pa phyi ma dang / srid pa lan grangs gzhan dag la sdig pa mi dge ba kun tu spyod pa 'grib par byed pa dang / chung dur byed pa nas
gsog tu byed pa'i bar dang / legs pa dge ba kun tu spyod pa 'phel bar 'gyur ba nas dpag tu med pa'i bar du 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa'ang gsog cing sgom
par byed de/ legs pa dge ba kun tu spyad pa rnams yongs su smin pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe
yul da ra da nas da ra da'i rgyal po sin du gi ri zhes bya ba'i bu bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir wA ra Na sIr song nas de bcom ldan 'das dang thag
mi ring ba zhig na 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas da ra da'i rgyal po sin du gi ri'i bu stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud na bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ khyod kyis legs par bka' stsal to/ /bde bar
gshegs pa/ khyod kyis legs par bka' stsal to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub kyi sems kyi gsol bar 'debs shing snying thag pa rus pa'i khong nas yid la bgyis te/ sems
can thams cad kyis bsams nas dus gsum du gsol bar 'debs shing brjod pa gang lags pa de tsam yang / bcom ldan 'das/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs
'phel bar 'gyur zhing yang dag par rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur/ gsog par 'gyur/ grangs ma mchis par bgyid/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa'ang
gsog cing sgom pa dang / yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing sra ba dang / brtan pa dang / rdo rje lta bur 'gyur na gong du rtsol zhing brtson pa mi gtong ba lta ci smos lags/ bcom ldan
'das/ bdag kyang snying thag pa rus pa'i khong nas yid la bgyid de/ sems can thams cad kyis bsams nas sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / dgrol bar bgyi ba dang /
dbugs dbyung ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bgyi ba'i
slad du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs te/ sems can ma brgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang / ma grol ba rnams dgrol ba/ dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs
'byin pa/ yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig /yang dang yang du lan brgyar brnan te/ mtha' yas pa mtha' yas
bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs lags so/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu dpal dbyig gis kyang de'i rjes thogs su de bzhin du bla na med
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu dpal dbyig dang / da ra da'i rgyal po'i bu dang /
byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
par bstod do/ /'phags pa dpal dbyig gis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / pra dz+nyA warma dang /
zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya rat+na dzA lI pa ri pr-its+tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra /
bod skad du/ 'phags pa rin chen dra ba can gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag
gis thos ba dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na/ khang pa brtsags pa'i gnas na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu
bzhugs te/ byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams dang / skye ba gnyis kyis thogs pa rnams dang / skye ba gsum gyis thogs pa rnams
dang | skye ba bzhis thogs pa rnams dang / skye ba lngas thogs pa rnams dang / skye ba bcus thogs pa rnams dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / skye ba stong gi
bar rnams kyis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dgra bcom pa bye ba phrag drug cu dang / lha bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu la 'dod pa na spyod pa
dang | gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu shin tu dpal bzang ldan dang /
lha'i bu zla ba'i 'od dang / lha'i bu nyi ma'i 'od dang / lha'i bu grags pa'i tog dang / lha'i bu mngon par dga' ba dang / de dag dang / gzhan yang / lha bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / klu'i
rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang / gzi can dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / klu'i rgyal po btang zung dang /
klu'i rgyal po btang zung chen po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po thams cad kyi 'khor dang yang thabs gcig go /de'i tshe grong khyer chen po yangs pa can
na ded dpon seng ge'i bu li tsa bI stobs mtha' yas zhes bya ba zhig gnas so/ /de'i tshe seng ge'i bu stobs mtha' yas de'i bu gzhon nu li tsa bI rin chen dra ba can zhes bya ba sangs rgyas
mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ chos kyi tshul snang ba mtha' yas pa'i sgron ma dang ldan pa yang dag par 'dzin pa/ na tshod lo brgyad lon pa 'dra ba zhig gnyid log ste/ de'i rmi lam du rmis
pa| lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan/ dga' ldan gyi gnas nas babs nas tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis bskul te mngon par smras pa/ sems can snying po rgyal ba sangs rgyas kyis/ /stong
gsum 'jig rten snang ba mdzad nas bzhugs/ /bsod nams brgya bsags gser gyi mdog 'dra ba/ /bdag nyid chen po gzugs kyi ma lus mdzes/ /dkyil 'khor bye ba rab tshang
gang yin pa/ /zla ba stong ngam yang na bye ba yi/ /'od zer dag gi dkyil 'khor de snang byed/ /ji ltar gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma rnyed/ /de 'dra'i dkyil 'khor bye bar tshang ba ni/ /shar phyogs
dkyil 'khor mchog ni snang byed cing / /de bzhin lho phyogs de bzhin nub phyogs dang / /de bzhin byang phyogs dkyil 'khor mchog snang byed/ /'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad spu yi
khung | |re re nas ni 'od zer gang dag 'byung / /re re nas ni 'od byung de dag gis/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad mog mog mdzad/ /kun gzigs rnams kyis spu khung re re nas/ /'od
zer 'byung zhing spu khung re re nas/ /'od zer byung ba rnams kyis gang+gA'i klung / /drug cu rtsa drug bye snyed rab gsal mdzad/ /de nas li tsa bI gzhon nu rin chen dra ba can de'i mtshan mo 'das
nas| pha stobs mtha' yas la smras pa/ yab/ mdang sum lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan dga' ldan gyi gnas nas babs nas bdag la tshigs su bcad
pa'i dbyangs kyis bskul ba bgyis par gyur to/ /'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyi ba'i las brtsam pa'i slad du yab la bdag gsol bar bgyid do/ /de nas li
tsa bI gzhon nu rin chen dra ba can gyis/ pha stobs mtha' yas la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ sems can kun gyi ded dpon rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'jig rten mkhas pa bsam
yas bdag nyid che/ /skyob pa de la khyod kyis mchod don mdzod/ /'dren pa de ni 'jig rten 'byung bar dka'/ /ji ltar u dum bA ra'i me tog ni/ /mdog ldan mdzes shing shin
tu dri zhim la/ /dri ngad ldan zhing rdul bcom nyon mongs med/ /de 'dra'i me tog mchog ni rnyed par dka'/ /de phyir bdag gi yab la gsol 'debs pa/ /de ni dgyes pa'i thugs
kyis bdag la gnang / /gang zhig 'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad pa/ /don dam gzigs pa la ni mchod par bgyid/ /li tsa bI stobs mtha' yas sems dga' bas/ li tsa
bI seng ge zhes bya ba la smras pa/ ded dpon rgyal ba la ni mchod mdzad de/ /bdag gi gzhon nu bstan la gnas par mdzod/ /'dren pa shAkya seng ge mchod pa dang / /gzhon nu mchog
gi spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir/ /khyim pa bye ba drug cu brtson par gyur/ /brgya byin lha mig stong dang ldan pa dang / /tshangs pa dang ni dbang phyug dbang sgyur lha/ /bdud kyi bu po ded dpon
bzang po dang / /bye ba sa yi lha dang lhan cig tu/ /yangs pa can gyi dga' bar thams cad zhugs/ /gser las byas dang de bzhin dngul gyi khri/ /bye ba khrag ni stong du tshang ba dag /rin
chen bdun gyis de dag mdzes byas pa/ /re re yang ni bye ba stong du tshang / /khri yi g.yas dang g.yon du rin po che/ /rin chen sna bdun rgyal mtshan bzang po btsugs/ /khri re'i tshad ni
dpag tshad rangs par yod/ /rgyal mtshan dag kyang dpag tshad phyed par mtho/ /rgyal mtshan rnams kyi g.yas dang g.yon du ni/ /de'i drung dpag tshad pas mtho stegs bu dag /rang
bzhin gcig ste nor bu rin po che/ /bye ba las byas dpag tshad mtho bar 'phags/ /khri yi bar bar lha yi ba dan yang / /dpag tshad pas kyang ring ba sha stag dpyangs/ /ba dan lda ldi
gser gyi dra ba dag /dril bu g.yer ka dag gis mdzes par byas/ /khri rnams kyi ni 'og tu ka ba yang / /bye ba phrag stong bye ba legs par sbyar/ /gang gis 'di ru khri mchog de dag ni/
brtan par byas pa sgo gtan bcug pa bzhin/ /khri yi steng du gser las byas pa dang / /gser lta bu dang dngul dang bai DUR+ya/ /de bzhin shel dang spug dang rdo snying dang / /de bzhin rtsa ba
dang ni khog pa nas/ /byung ba min pa'i mu tig gdugs dag byas/ /tsan+dan shin tu dmar pos dmar bar bskus/ /re re dag ni bye ba stong du tshang / /khri rnams
dang ni khri tshul lta bu yi/ /mkha' rten dag kyang byas nas de la ni/ /gser gyi dra ba dang ni gser lta bu/ /dngul dang bai DUR+ya dang de bzhin shel/ /spug dang de bzhin rdo yi snying po yi//
mkha' rten so so byas nas de la ni/ /rin chen dril sgra shin tu snyan pa btags/ /rnam 'dren sgra ni rnam par grags pa yi/ /mchod pa'i don du bdug pa rab tu bzhag /yangs pa can
gyi steng gi bar snang la/ /gser gyi skud pa las byas bla re bres/ /gser gyi skud pa re re mchog tu bzang / /rin chen chun 'phyang stong phrag bye ba dpyangs/ /mu tig rgyan 'phreng stong phrag
bye ba yang / /re re gser las byas pa'i skud pas brgyus/ /yangs pa'i grong khyer gnas pa'i li tsa bI/ /gang dag gang du 'dong ba der nyams dga'/ /de tshe sa ni skyes bu bdun srid
g.yogs/ /grong khyer yangs pa kun tu ras yug bkram/ /dra ba can gyis tsan+dan dmar btags nas/ /ras rnams la ni legs par bsku ba byas/ /bye ba stong phrag bdun cu'i sil
snyan dag /rnam pa stong rnams g.yas kyi phyogs nas 'khrol/ /g.yon gyi phyogs su'ang bye ba bdun cu stong / /shAkya seng ge mchod pa'i don du brtson/ /de 'dra'i bkod chen byas
nas li tsa bI/ /gzhon nu dra ba can gyis de yi tshe/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis pha ma la smras pa/ /sangs rgyas spyan drangs slad du bdag mchi'o/ /grong khyer mchog nas mkhas pa de byung
ste| |rgyal bdag chen po ga la bar song nas/ /yon tan rgya mtsho zhabs la mgo bo yis/ /phyag btsal der ni gzhon nu phyogs gcig 'dug /de nas li tsa bI gzhon nu rin chen dra ba can/
yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas li tsa bI gzhon nu rin chen dra ba can de la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par dga' bar mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin
du 'jug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/ /de nas li tsa bI gzhon nu rin chen dra ba can gyis bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo
g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sang dge
slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang / bcom ldan 'das kyis li tsa bI gzhon nu rin chen dra ba can la thugs brtse ba nye bar
bzung ste/ cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ngo / /de nas li tsa bI gzhon nu rin chen dra ba can bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung par gyur pas gnang
bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo / /de nas li tsa bI gzhon nu rin chen dra ba can lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi
mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu dpal bzang ldan dang lhan cig tu yangs pa'i grong khyer chen por zhugs so/ /spro ba dang / dga' ba'i gzugs rnams kyis zhal zas
ro brgya dang ldan pa'i rnam pa sbyor du bcug go /sbyar nas de'i mtshan mo 'das pa dang / gdan bshams shing yangs pa legs par brgyan nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der
song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ li tsa bI gzhon nu rin chen dra ba can
gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gdugs tshod la bab ste/ de'i dus la dbab par mkhyen na gdugs tshod lags te/ dus la bab lags
so| |de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe smad g.yogs dang / chos gos gsol/ lhung bzed bsnams te dge slong gi dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dang thabs gcig tu steng
gi bar snang la mi bdun gyi srid tsam du mngon par 'phags te yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen por gshegs so/ /bskyod ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis stong gsum
gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad rnam pa drug tu 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun du rab tu g.yos/ ldeg /rab tu
ldeg |kun tu rab tu ldeg /'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem ste/ ltas bco brgyad dang ldan pa rnam pa drug
tu g.yos so/ /gzhan yang / /cho 'phrul bye ba sa ya brgya phrag stong snyed ston cing yangs pa can du gshegs so/ /de'i tshe lha bye ba sa ya brgya phrag stong du ma lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang /
pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po rnams dang / lha'i rin po che las byas pa'i me tog rnams dang / lha'i a ga ru'i phye ma dang / rin po che'i phye ma dang / dzam+bu chu bo'i gser dang /
lha'i rin po che'i phye ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to/ /lha'i sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum mngon par rab tu dkrol to/ /
lha'i rgyan dpag tu med pa rnams kyis brgyan to/ /steng gi bar snang la tsan+dan dmar po shing rta'i srog shing tsam gyi char gyi rgyun phab par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la li tsa bI
gzhon nu rin chen dra ba can gyi gnas ga la ba der gshegs te/ byon nas gdan bshams pa de la bzhugs te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / dge slong
ma'i dge 'dun dang dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor rnams dang thabs gcig go /de nas li tsa bI gzhon nu rin chen dra ba can bcom ldan 'das bzhugs par rig
nas rang gi lag nas bca' ba dang / bza' ba dang / myang ba bzang po rab tu mang pos tshim par byed cing gang bzhed pa stobs par byed do/ /de nas li tsa bI gzhon nu rin chen
dra ba can bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas gsol lags par rig nas lhung bzed blangs te chab phul nas phyag bcabs so/ /bye ba khrag khrig 'bum ri ba'i chos gos gsum
gyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gsol to/ /dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / dge slong ma'i dge 'dun dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor rnams la'ang chos gos
gsum gyis mngon par g.yogs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis mthus so/ /de nas li tsa bI gzhon nu rin chen dra ba can gyis bcom ldan 'das
la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bdag phyogs
'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis li tsa bI gzhon nu rin chen dra ba can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gzhon nu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la gang dang / gang som nyi yod
pa zhus shig dang / ngas de dang / de'i zhu ba lung bstan pas sems rangs par bya'o/ /de nas li tsa bI gzhon nu rin chen dra ba can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi smon lam dang ldan pa bzhugs shing 'tsho ba gang dag gi mtshan thos pa tsam gyis
byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo so ma nyi ma mchis shing the tshom ma mchis par 'gyur/ phyir mi ldog cing bla na ma mchis
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'ang 'gyur/ tshe rabs dran pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur/ nam du'ang ser sna'i sems dang lhan cig mi gnas/ byang chub sems dpa'i
'khor gyis kyang yongs su bskor bar 'gyur/ nyan thos kyi 'khor dang bral bar 'gyur/ yon tan grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyis kyang yongs su bzung bar 'gyur/
sangs rgyas thams cad mngon par bgyis pas sems can thams cad yang dag par tshim par bgyid/ bdud thams cad shin tu skrag par bgyid/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad
sbyong / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa'i dri ma sel/ sems can thams cad chos dkar po la yang dag par bskul/ lhas kyang yongs
su bzung bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas kyang bsam par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyang byin gyis rlob par mdzad/ nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dag kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ sgra dbyangs kyi rnam pa stong
phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par thob par 'gyur/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs su 'gyur/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mthun pa'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan pa lta bzhugs
lags sam/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis li tsa bI gzhon nu rin chen dra ba can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gzhon nu/ legs so/ /legs
so| |gang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems dpa' ni spobs pa legs shing dpyod pa bzang ngo / /de'i phyir gzhon nu khyod legs par nyon la yid la
zungs shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol te/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dra ba can sems rtse gcig tu bcom ldan
'das kyis ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gzhon nu/ 'di nas shar phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams mu tig can zhes bya
ba zhig yod de/ gzhon nu/ 'di lta ste/ srid pa'i rtse mo gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gyur la/ de dag thams cad kyang rdul phra mo'i rdul snyed kyis yongs su gang bar gyur cing / de
nas skyes bu 'ga' zhig byung bas de dag la rdul phra mo'i rdul cig khyer te/ ji tsam du 'jig rten gyi khams srid pa'i rtse mo'i mthas gtugs pa de dag rdul phra mo'i rdul gyis yongs
su gang ba ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum 'das nas rdul phra mo'i rdul gcig 'jog na/ gzhon nu/ rnam grangs de dang / grangs de'i gzhis yun ring po 'das
pas rdul phra mo'i rdul gyi phung po chen po'i mtha' de dag zad pa'am/ gtugs par 'gyur ram/ gzhon nu/ de ci snyam du sems/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang du skyes bu des
rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag bzhag pa'am/ ma bzhag pa de dag bsam pa'am/ bgrang ba'am/ gzhal ba'am/ nye bar brtag par sla'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni
ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du gang zhig dpe 'di bshad pa la yang dag pa'i 'du shes bskyed par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni shes pa'i phung po mchog dang
ldan par 'gyur ba lags so/ /gzhon nu/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang du skyes bu des rdul phra mo'i rdul de dag bzhag gam/ 'on te ma bzhag pa'i
'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad kyi 'og gi chu'i phung po nas bzung nas srid pa'i rtse mo la thug gi bar gyi rdul phra mo'i rdul rnams kyis yongs su gang bar gyur la/ skyes
bu gnyis pa zhig byung bas de dag las rdul phra mo'i rdul cig khyer te/ ji tsam du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi rdul phra mo'i rdul de snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag
khrig phrag 'bum 'das nas rdul gcig 'jog na/ gzhon nu/ rnam grangs des na yun ring po 'das pas rdul phra mo'i rdul bsags pa'i phung po chen po de 'dor bar
'gyur ro/ /gzhon nu/ rnam grangs des na skyes bu phyi ma des grangs med pa brgya stong dgu bcu rtsa dgur bsgyur ba 'das nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig
phrag 'bum snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mu tig can no/ /de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od zer zla
bas brgyan pa mkhas pa'i gzi brjid dbyangs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg
pa la yang dag par gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od zer zla bas
brgyan pa mkhas pa'i gzi brjid dbyangs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po de'i mtshan la som nyi mi za zhing ngas mthong ba la'ang yid ches na/ de'i tshe 'das pa'i 'og tu 'khor los bsgyur ba'i
rgyal srid 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de'i rgyal srid la'ang sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur zhing de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong nas kyang mchod pa dpag tu med pa byed par 'gyur/
tshangs par spyod par yang 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa lnga'ang rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ma thag tu gzungs brgya 'khyil ba zhes bya ba
'thob par 'gyur/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas dag la bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur/ de snyed kyi bskal pa bye ba nyid du 'khor ba las phyir phyogs par byed par 'gyur
de'i sems shin tu rmongs pa med cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur/ sred med kyi bu'i lus ltar mkhregs pa'i lus su 'gyur/ lus dbyibs
gcig la sbi dza bzhi bar 'gyur/ de'i lus kyi mdog gser gyi kha dog 'dra bar 'gyur/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis lus brgyan cing tshangs pa'i sgra
dbyangs su'ang 'gyur/ mi khoms pa thams cad kyang spong zhing dal ba phun sum tshogs pa'ang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don
'di nyid rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig 'jig rten mgon po'i mtshan/ /thos nas som nyi mi za zhing / /ngas mthong ba la'ang
yid ches pa/ /de ni yon gnas 'os pa yin/ /rtag tu 'khor los bsgyur ba yi/ /rgyal srid 'thob cing sangs rgyas mthong / /mthong nas dpag tu med pa dang / /bsam
gyis mi khyab mchod pa byed/ /rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa dang / /mngon par shes rnams rtogs par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas mthong nas brgya 'khyil ba'i/ /gzungs kyang
de yis 'thob par 'gyur/ /ji ltar gang+gA'i bye ma snyed/ /de snyed sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/ de snyed bskal pa bye ba ru/ /'khor ba dag ni spangs par 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'jig rten
mgon po'i mtshan/ /tshogs dang dge 'dun dag la brjod/ /de yi sems ni mi rmongs shing / /sangs rgyas byang chub rgyu byed do/ /rtag tu sred med bu 'dra zhing / /lus dbyibs
gcig la sbi dza bzhi/ /lus ni gser gyi mdog 'dra zhing / /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang 'gyur/ /gang zhig mtshan ni thos nas su/ /yan lag lnga yis phyag byas
na| |rtag tu tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan zhing / /mi khom pa yang spangs par 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'jig rten mgon po'i mtshan/ /thos nas som nyi mi za ba/ /de ni byang chub la mi
'gong / /de ni nam yang som nyi med/ /gang zhig nyin dang mtshan bdun du/ /tshang bar rgyal ba'i mtshan 'dzin pa/ /sangs rgyas bsngags pa mtha' yas pa'i/ /mig ni rnam
par dag par 'gyur/ /mi de yi ni sha yi mig /lha yi mig tu rnam sbyong ste/ /gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi/ /sangs rgyas mang po mthong bar 'gyur/ /thams cad la ni mchod byed
cing / /thams cad las ni thos pa 'dzin/ /mig gis thams cad mthong nas su/ /mi rnams thams cad dbugs 'byin to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thos pa/ /sngon
chad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /bsnyen bkur sangs rgyas dag la byas/ /de dag thams cad rjes dran 'gyur/ /srog chags gang rnams mdun dag tu/ /mtshan ni bstan
par byas gyur na/ /sems can gzhan gyis de mthong zhing / /nges par byang chub 'gyur ba yin/ /sangs rgyas la ni dad bskyed pas/ /mi khom thams cad rnam par spangs/ /
rtsod dang 'gyed pa byas pas ni/ /mi khom rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ /thub pa chen po de yi mtshan/ /sems can gcig cig thos byas na/ /rtsod pa dang ni 'gyed pa yang / /
yid la byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /gal te mnar med pa yi las/ /bskal pa gnas par 'gyur ba dag /klad nad tsam zhig bskyed nas su/ /las kun
rnam par smin mi 'gyur/ /de la mes ni mi tshig cing / /chu yi nang du 'chi mi 'gyur/ /de la rgyal po rab khros kyang / /myur ba nyid du zhi bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig thub pa'i
mtshan 'dzin pa/ /nam yang long ba zhar ba dang / /'theng dang sgur dang lus nyams dang / /nad ni mang por mi 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dri za yi dwags dang / /grul bum
srin po mi rnams ni/ /sdig can ma rungs pa rnams dag /mi de la ni gnod mi byed/ /gang zhig thub pa'i mtshan 'dzin pa/ /'byung po dri za gnod sbyin rnams/ /klu dang lha
rnams thams cad kyi/ /yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar 'gyur/ /'dir ni skyob pa'i mtshan thos pa/ /shin tu bsags pa dam pa'i dbyangs/ /ting 'dzin myur du thob par 'gyur//
yon tan bye ba rab tu sgrogs/ /gang zhig 'jig rten mgon po'i mtshan/ /thos nas som nyi mi za ba/ /phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe dag tu/ /de yi byang chub 'di 'dzin to/ /thub pa chen po'i
mtshan thos pa/ /sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das rnams kyi/ /legs par gsungs pa'i chos kyi tshul/ /'dzin cing yang dag rab tu ston/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis legs
gsungs pa'i/ /chos de rnams ni des 'dzin to/ /bkod pa mchog ni nges byed cing / /sangs rgyas kun la bsnyen bkur byed/ /de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ /sangs rgyas bye ba des myur
mthong / /sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa yi/ /chos rnams de dag 'dzin par byed/ /skyob pa de yi mtshan thos pa/ /srog chags bye ba nan tan gyis/ /'dul bar byed cing rab
tu 'god/ /thams cad byang chub phyir 'jog go /nga yis mthong la'ang yid ches pa/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rab tu bstan pa 'dzin 'gyur zhing / /sangs rgyas rnams
kyang mchod par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas mkhyen la gang dad pa/ /ngas mthong ba la'ang de yid ches/ /'ching ba rnams las des rnams 'grol/ /klong las brgal cing 'jigs pa
med| |gang zhig dam pa'i chos spong ba/ /de ni bdud kyi sde yin no/ /'gro ba lnga ru 'gro ba yi/ /sems can kun gyi ba spu gang / /de ni ston pa'i pus mo yi/ /lha nga gcig gis ba spu ra
sdud| |skyob pa 'jig rten mgon po yi/ /ba spu gcig gi khung bu nas/ /ji ltar gang+gA'i bye ma snyed/ /de snyed 'od zer 'byin par mdzad/ /gang zhig 'jig rten mgon 'di
yi| |'od zer mtha' yas la yid ches/ /tshe gcig gis ni sangs rgyas rnams/ /sangs rgyas bye ba mthong bar 'gyur/ /chos kyi rgyal po mdo sde 'di/ /bshad pa gang zhig
thos gyur nas/ /nam yang yid gnyis mi za ba/ /de ni nga dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /yangs pa can du mdo sde 'di/ /bshad pa'i tshe na sus thos pa/ /de ni
phyi ma'i dus su des/ /gzhan la yang dag rab tu ston/ /ji ltar gang+gA'i bye ma dag /mi gang gis ni mang brjod pa/ /de snyed 'jig rten khams rnams su/ /'od zer gcig gis
khyab par byed/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad dag /bgrang ba'i tshul gyis mi mchod pa/ /gser rnams kyis ni bkang nas su/ /'jig rten mgon la phul ba
pas| |'di yi mtshan ni thos nas su/ /dga' ba bzang po skyes gyur te/ /sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal zhes brjod pa/ /de yi bsod nams bsam mi khyab/ /'jig rten mgon
ni thams cad la/ /yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal ba/ /de yi bsod nams phung po ni/ /tshad ni bshad par mi nus so/ /gang zhig 'jig rten mgon po'i mtshan/ /thos
nas som nyi mi za ba/ /de yi lus ni 'od zer gyis/ /khyab cing rin po che ltar 'gyur/ /gang zhig thub pa'i mtshan 'dzin pa/ /de ni rnam par 'das gyur nas/ /lha yi tsan+dan dmar
po yi| |dri zhim kha nas rab tu 'byung / /skyob pa sems can snying po yi/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni mtshan thos pa/ /ba spu'i khung nas 'od zer dag /bkye bas lus kyang mdzes par 'gyur//
tshe rabs dag ni thams cad du/ /thos pa mang por 'gyur ba ste/ /kun dga' sangs rgyas ci 'dra ba'i/ /dpag tu med pa'i thos pa'ang 'dzin/ /'jig rten snang byed des mthong nas/ /gzhal
gyis mi lang dga' ba 'thob/ /byang chub spyad pa spyod pa na/ /tshe rabs dang ni dran par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i thugs sras mthong nas kyang / /gzhal gyis mi lang dga' ba 'thob/ /
spos dang me tog byug rnams kyis/ /mchod pa dag ni rgya chen byed/ /'jig rten mgon po de yi mtshan/ /brjod pa 'dzin par mi byed de/ /bdud kyi phyogs dang sngon chad ni/ /mu
stegs gyur pa ma gtogs so/ /nga yis tshul 'di bshad pa na/ /sngon ni gang gis 'di thos pa/ /phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe dag tu/ /de yi lag tu mdo sde 'thob/ /nga yi mdo sde dam pa 'di/
bshad pa dag ni sus thos pa/ /sngon ni mchod cing bkur sti byas/ /de yi lag tu 'di 'thob bo/ /gang gis smon lam btab pa ni/ /phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe dag tu/ /chos kyi rgyal
pos gsungs pa yi/ /mdo 'di lag tu 'thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig sems ni rtse gcig gis/ /sangs rgyas grangs med bkur sti bas/ /mdo 'di la ni gang dad pa/ /de
bas bsod nams 'di mang 'gyur/ /rtag tu gzugs bzang bsod nams ldan/ /shin tu 'jigs med longs spyod ldan/ /dran dang ldan zhing mtshan rnams kyis/ /mngon par
brgyan pa dag tu 'gyur/ /de lta bas na mdo sde 'di/ /thos nas phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe/ /bzung zhing yang dag bstan pa dang / /gzhan dag la yang bstan
par gyis/ /gang gis sangs rgyas 'khor los bsgyur/ /'bum phrag dag la bkur byas pas/ /phyi ma yi ni dus dag tu/ /des mthong ba la som nyi med/ /gang gis sngon ni
'jig rten mgon/ /grangs med pa la bsnyen bkur byas/ /de yis 'jig rten mgon 'di yi/ /thos shing mthong la'ang yid ches so/ /gang zhig mtshan 'di thos nas su//
sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs byed pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /bstan pa dang ni dam chos bsrung / /gang zhig byang chub bstan spangs na/ /bskal pa bye ba dag tu ni/ /
lug ltar lkugs cing mig nyams la/ /mig med pa dag tu yang 'gyur/ /gang zhig lag pa gcig gis ni/ /mchod rten grangs med bshig byas pas/ /gang gis mdo sde
'di spangs na/ /khyad ches sdig par 'di 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na nga smra ba/ /phyi ma'i dus tshe 'di rnyed nas/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bla med la/ /so ma nyi za bar ma byed cig /mdo
sde 'di 'dra 'di thos nas/ /me tog spos dang 'phan rnams dang / /gdugs dang phye ma gos rnams kyis/ /gus par byas te mchod par gyis/ /der ni de bzhin gshegs pa
yi| |phyag mnyen shin tu 'jam pa yis/ /li tsa bI yi mgo bo la/ /yang dang yang du byug pa mdzad/ /de yi rjes la lha rnams kyis/ /sgra skad chen po phyung gyur cing / /lha yi me tog
ku su ma/ |yid 'ong gtor cing zhing 'di bkang / /lha rnams mkha' la 'dug nas su/ /glu dbyangs dpag tu med pa len/ /tshangs pa dag ni bye ba yis/ /tsan+dan dmar po'i char phab
po| |de bzhin gshegs pas mdo sde 'di/ /gsungs tshe dra ba can thos te/ /sems ni rangs shing yid dga' nas/ /de bzhin gshegs la tshig gsol pa/ /phyi ma'i dus su bdag
gis ni/ /dge slong bgyis la mi 'jigs pa/ /grong dang grong khyer rnams dag tu/ /mdo sde 'di ni bshad par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas bka' bzhin bdag bgyid de/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la dpal
gyis gsungs/ /dpag tshad bye bar mchis nas su/ /'di yi tshul ni bshad par bgyi/ /lha kun dang ni klu rnams dang / /yang na mi'am ci dang ni/ /mi ma yin rnams mgron gnyer
te| |chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par bgyi/ /bla na med pa'i mdo sde 'di/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs pa na/ /lha ma yin tshogs dga' gyur nas/ /me tog dpag tu med pa 'thor//
sangs rgyas kyi ni zhing 'di dag /mi mchog shAkya seng ge yi/ /chos kyi rgyal po'i spu gcig gis/ /zhing rnams thams cad snang bar mdzad/ /sems can snying po'i bdag nyid can/ /
ston pa yi ni ljags phyung nas/ /gang+gA'i bye ma snyed dag gi /zhing rnams bye ba khebs par mdzad/ /de bzhin phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi/ /zhing rnams
bye ba khebs mdzad de/ /gzhon nu rin chen dra ba can/ /dpa' bo dang ni li tsa bI/ /bye ba drug cu tsam dag ni/ /lhan cig lhags la bka' stsol cig /de nas der ni ston pa
yis| |de dag chos la gzud par mdzad/ /bde ba thams cad sbyin mdzad pa/ /sangs rgyas spyan ni thogs pa med/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams dpag med de/ /sangs
rgyas chos la the tshom spong / /sangs rgyas ye shes thogs med de/ /dus gsum rnams la'ang 'jug par mdzad/ /chos rnams kun la mnga' brnyes pas/ /sangs rgyas
la ni mi mkhyen med/ /phung po rnams ni med pa'o zhes/ /mi yi 'dren pa ston par mdzad/ /khams bzhi dag ni gsog dang 'dra/ /gang du'ang sgra la chags pa med/ /gzugs
dang tshor ba 'du shes dang / /sems pa dang ni 'du byed dang / /rnam shes phung po'i snying po ni/ /med pa dag tu shes par gyis/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs pa bzhin/ /de
ltar phung po rnams phye na/ /myur du gzungs rnams 'thob 'gyur zhing / /shin tu rmongs pa med par 'gyur/ /chos rnams dag ni gsob dang 'dra/ /thams cad stong zhing
bdag med de/ /rtsod la med cing rmongs med pa/ /de skad de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ /gzhon nu/ lho phyogs logs na gzhon nu dpe snga ma lta bu las nyis 'gyur gyi rdul
phra mo'i rdul bgrangs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gnyis 'das pa na de na zla bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ /de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog gi 'od kyis rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /gzhon nu
byang chub sems dpa' theg pa la yang dag par gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi 'od kyis
rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa de'i mtshan thos nas som nyi mi za la ngas mthong ba la'ang yid ches na de tshe 'das pa'i 'og tu 'od zer rab tu gtong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin thob par 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa khrir 'jug par 'thob par 'gyur/ gzungs kyi sgo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs
med pa drug cu po rgya mtsho lta bu zhes bya ba'i gzungs la sogs pa nas rin po che'i mdzod kyi gzungs la thug pa'i bar la 'jug pa 'thob cing byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar
du de dag la rmongs par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe shar phyogs nas sangs rgyas bye ba gshegs nas zhal ston par mdzad do/
phyogs thams cad nas kyang de dang 'dra'o/ /gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gsungs par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang 'dzin par 'gyur/ byang chub ma
thob kyi bar du de'i chos kyi tshul de 'jig par mi 'gyur/ las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nas bzung nas bskal pa lnga brgyar 'khor ba las phyir phyogs par byas nas
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la reg par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /mi yi dbang po 'jig
rten mgon/ /skyob pa yi ni mtshan thos pa/ /bskal pa lnga brgya tham pa yi/ /'khor ba dag ni bzlog par 'gyur/ /'chi ba dag gi dus tshe yang / /sangs rgyas bye ba ston par
mdzad/ /mthong nas dbang pos phyag 'tshal te/ /chos kyang nyan cing 'dzin par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thos pa/ /spyad pa dam pa spyod pa na/ /de yis bstan
pa'i chos gang dag /bskal pa bye bar chud mi gson/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni mtshan bsgrags pas/ /rin chen zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin/ /stong phrag bdun cu de tshe 'thob/ /yon
tan bye bar sgrogs par 'gyur/ /gang zhig thub pa'i mtshan 'dzin pa/ /ting 'dzin grangs med bye ba dang / /de bzhin sa ya drug cu dag /de la nye bar gnas par 'gyur/ /de bas
mnyam gzhag dpa' bo yi/ /byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ /sems can mang po stong rnam dag /byang chub mchog la 'jog par byed/ /byang chub ma rdzogs par du ni/ /nam yang
'dod la ma bsten te/ /sems can gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi/ /mtshan bstan rnams ni zlog par byed/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas mtshan thos nas/ /srog chags kun la 'di
ston pa/ /nam yang mi khom mi 'gyur zhing / /de yi dal ba rnyed mi dka'/ /shin tu bzung ba sangs rgyas dag /'byung ba mnyes par byas pas ni/ /de yi mi khom gang bsten pa//
de dag thams cad spangs par 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'dren pa mkhyen pa bzhin/ /gzhon nu gal te khyod shes na/ /ston pa'i mtshan ni bzung nas su/ /phyogs kun tu ni rab tu sgrogs/ /
de bas gzhon nu gzhan dag la/ /mtshan 'di rab tu bstan byas na/ /yang dag byang chub 'di bzung zhing / /'jig rten gyi ni mgon du 'gyur/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas mtshan thos
nas| |g.yeng ba med par 'di bzung ste/ /song nas gzhan dag la ston pa/ /de ni byang chub mngon du bsrung / /gang zhig mdo sde 'di thos nas/ /gzhan dag la ni rab ston na/ /
legs par gsungs pa'i chos kyi tshul/ /bstan pa 'di dag srung bar byed/ /gzhon nu/ nub phyogs logs na gzhon nu dpe snga ma lta bu de las
sum 'gyur gyi rdul phra mo'i rdul bgrangs pa'i tshul gyis de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen bkra ba zhes bya ba zhig yod
de| de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog rgyas pa sA la'i rgyal po zhes bya ba zhig bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
kyang ston to/ /gzhon nu/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa me tog rgyas pa sA la'i
rgyal po zhes bya ba de'i mtshan thos nas som nyi mi za la ngas mthong ba la'ang yid ches na de'i tshe 'das pa'i dus 'og tu chos lnga 'dzin par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/
lus zhig nas sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / der 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po nyid dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / chos kyi rnam grangs kyi gzungs te/ de'ang stong
'khyil pa'i gzungs dang / byang chub thob kyi bar du skyes bu chen po mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag 'thob pa ste/ chos lnga po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig mi yi khyu mchog skyob pa'i mtshan/ /thos nas som nyi med cing dad bskyed nas/ /de yis chos lnga
